attributes.title: SKINDRED
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3jTlKw98Ql1jGRPYqhqHap?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Au bout du 4ème passage des Gallois en nos contrées, vous allez bien le remarquer qu’on a un petit crush avec SKINDRED. Mais comment ne pas craquer et tomber en pâmoison devant leur mélange incandescent de punk, de rock, de metal, de ragga et d’électro ? Benji, son bouillonnant frontman, et sa bande vont une nouvelle fois vous emporter dans le tourbillon de leur groove infectieux. Alors, vous les sentez vous aussi les papillons dans le ventre ?

attributes.title: SKINDRED
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3jTlKw98Ql1jGRPYqhqHap?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/acJsckmvSwY?si=U01Oxd177H1AYlqo" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: 4th visit of the Welsh lads to the festival grounds. Yes, we have a little crush on them... How can you not fall for and resist the charm of their incandescent mix of punk, rock, metal, reggae and electro? Benji and his mates will once again take you into the whirlwind of their infectious groove. Most probably the best live act in Britain.

attributes.title: ALCEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0d5ZwMtCer8dQdOPAgWhe7?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B_fCrew2ZOQ?si=lWUlu_osuOKtRLzT" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Dans l’élégant univers d’ALCEST, tout semble pur, apaisé, voire tendre. Mais ne vous y méprenez pas, le souffle de la tempête n’est jamais bien loin. Un équilibre fragile entre dark metal et post-rock, et aussi lumineux soit-il, le blackgaze mélancolique proposé par ces pionniers du genre vous happe et vous traîne avec lui jusqu’aux ténèbres les plus flamboyantes. Un voyage spirituel et harmonieux vous tend les bras.

attributes.title: ALCEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0d5ZwMtCer8dQdOPAgWhe7?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B_fCrew2ZOQ?si=lWUlu_osuOKtRLzT" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: In the ethereal world of ALCEST, purity and tranquility reign supreme—but don’t be fooled, the storm’s whisper is ever-present. Masterfully balancing dark metal and post-rock, these pioneers of melancholic blackgaze craft a soundscape that envelops and pulls you into radiant darkness. A spiritual, harmonious journey like no other awaits.

attributes.title: AIRBOURNE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6urzdpGY5yUimWZsgJUoTb?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8myjtCqI0qw?si=JDonEaFzrFU_rvYi" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Si l’Elixir de Jouvence auquel carburent ces wallabys épileptiques a de sérieux relents de houblon et de malt, personne n’en contestera son extrême efficacité ! Malgré la barrière des vingt berges de carrière qui se profile inéluctablement, ces éternels adolescents distribuent à tout-va des cartouches comme du temps de l’éclosion de leurs premiers boutons d’acné. Du hard rock puissant, pur et dur, comme seule l’Île-continent est capable d’en produire.

attributes.title: AIRBOURNE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6urzdpGY5yUimWZsgJUoTb?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8myjtCqI0qw?si=JDonEaFzrFU_rvYi" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: If the Fountain of Youth exists, it may very well be in Australia. Unstoppable and consistently electrifying, AIRBOURNE have defied time with a twenty-year career that sees these eternal teenagers conjure hard rock magic over and over again. Their sound is raw, thrilling, and a shining example of the best their continent has to offer. Get ready for a thunderous show on the main stage.

attributes.title: Fit For An Autopsy
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0qJpY7K8p7g6sacvaGNt6i?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sbtQl9dhP7w?si=MxbKeChVvmBf3G64" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Que vous soyez en mal de sensations fortes, à la recherche d’un défouloir pour évacuer les frustrations de la semaine de taf ou que vous ressentiez le besoin irrépressible d’extérioriser la colère sourde qui sommeille en vous, nous ne pouvons que vous prescrire une grosse dose de deathcore des furieux de FIT FOR AN AUTOPSY dont la force de frappe fera disparaître tous vos maux. Alors, prêt à vous faire charcuter ?

attributes.title: Fit For An Autopsy
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0qJpY7K8p7g6sacvaGNt6i?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sbtQl9dhP7w?si=MxbKeChVvmBf3G64" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Success hasn’t spoiled FIT FOR AN AUTOPSY as their music bears no sign of commercial concession or rehashed past glories whatsoever Looking for thrills? Need to release the frustrations of the work week? Or to express personal anger? Here is what you need: a massive dose of furious deathcore delivered by this New Jersey squad. Their striking force will make all your troubles disappear. Let’s get ready to be butchered!

attributes.title: Jinjer
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7o6cOczXTB8ioTAAJTbESf?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9Uaecbh8ta0?si=CIg3qn1Aub0_uEXj" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Au fil des années, le quatuor ukrainien s'est imposé dans le paysage du metal grâce à son travail acharné, ses tournées non-stop et son metalcore progressif décapant. JINJER est véritablement l'un des groupes de metal moderne les plus en vogue et les plus excitants du moment. Un des concerts-clés de cette édition et inéluctablement un des moments les plus vibrants sur le plan de l’émotion.

attributes.title: Jinjer
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7o6cOczXTB8ioTAAJTbESf?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9Uaecbh8ta0?si=CIg3qn1Aub0_uEXj" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Through the years, the Ukrainian four-piece wrecking machine known as JINJER have carved their very own place in the metal landscape thanks to their relentless hard work, non-stop touring and critically acclaimed releases. JINJER are truly one of modern metal's hottest and most exciting bands around today. JINJER has become synonymous with doing things their own way and breaking every rule in the Heavy Metal handbook.

attributes.title: Mental Cruelty
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2iE1NqruxoSxTvOpTCLkE9?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WXJwYl6L73w?si=cSYiH3Kh8eL0ck9X" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Tu aimes le brutal ? Tu aimes le sympho ? Alors, il se pourrait bien qu’on ait trouvé le candidat parfait pour toi. Cet enfant illégitime entre 2 mondes censés être en désaccord prend la forme d’un quintet teuton, qui, au vu de la tête de gros méchants pas contents de ses membres, ne semble pas là pour enfiler des perles. Growls sur fond d’orchestrations et technique au service de l’émotion : une force de frappe au cœur tendre… M’enfin, pas trop quand même, ne pensez pas que vous n’allez pas prendre cher !

attributes.title: Mental Cruelty
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2iE1NqruxoSxTvOpTCLkE9?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WXJwYl6L73w?si=cSYiH3Kh8eL0ck9X" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: How do you prefer your death metal? Kind of very brutal? Symphonic from time to time? MENTAL CRUELTY will please you at all levels. The German squad brilliantly offers ruthlessness, melody and original structures. A very ambitious mix of music that can appeal to fans of extreme music in the broad sense of the term.

attributes.title: WALKWAYS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3MCCstLsINdcgBTwONJdkI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CfJTkYDeTNk?si=oSV_JqYuMsFMtfGV" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Repoussant les limites de la musique heavy alternative, WALKWAYS partage ses émotions sincères et nues au moyen d'une énergie implacable et très personnelle. La musique du quintet de Tel-Aviv caresse autant qu’elle agresse. Une dynamique intrinsèque, gardée par un collectif fraternel très uni pour rassembler une puissante entité musicale émotionnelle. Un groupe unique à la richesse infinie.

attributes.title: WALKWAYS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3MCCstLsINdcgBTwONJdkI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CfJTkYDeTNk?si=oSV_JqYuMsFMtfGV" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Pushing the boundaries of alternative heavy music, Tel Aviv powerhouse WALKWAYS share their heartfelt and bare emotions by way of a relentless energy which weaves through intrinsic dynamics, guarded by a close-knit brotherhood collective to bring together a powerful emotional musical entity that has reached every corner of the globe. The band is driven with a goal to keep sane and evolve into more humane and moral people while writing their music - the soundtrack of the highs and lows of their lives!

attributes.title: WHITECHAPEL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5274obTQJjzjyycRyJlfml?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UzsX5pjZggo?si=Bl64IkLgzk-oD3VU" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Du gros, du gras, du qui tâche, du qui pue ! Le machine à broyer étatsunienne incarne encore et toujours la quintessence du deathcore près de 20 ans après ses premières éructations. Un monstre d’énergie et de puissance dont le temps a subtilement raffiné les morsures et les mornifles grâce à l’adjonction d’un peu de chant clair et d’expérimentation… Sans réduire son pouvoir de concassage ultime !

attributes.title: WHITECHAPEL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5274obTQJjzjyycRyJlfml?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UzsX5pjZggo?si=Bl64IkLgzk-oD3VU" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The American pummelling machine still embodies the quintessence of deathcore almost 20 years after its first belches and riffs. A monster of energy whose time has subtly refined the bites and snarls thanks to the addition of a little clean singing and experimentation… Without reducing its ultimate crushing power!

attributes.title: IHSAHN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2E1jLcUfqd9w2XtybNB2Za?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_cG_oEUQDeY?si=eCFS-nDHEsLA35uZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Tel un festivalier retrouvant chaque année son emplacement au Red Camp (ou tel un serial killer revenant sur les lieux du crime, à vous de voir ce qui vous sied le mieux), le pape du black metal vient s'assurer pour la 10ème fois si son rond de serviette est toujours bien en place à la table clissonnaise. Accueillir ce créateur de génie est toujours un réel plaisir. Au menu : un metal progressif et blackisant de haute volée.

attributes.title: IHSAHN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2E1jLcUfqd9w2XtybNB2Za?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_cG_oEUQDeY?si=eCFS-nDHEsLA35uZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Few artists in modern heavy music have created such an extraordinary and unique body of work as IHSAHN. Having refined and redefined black metal with the now legendary Emperor, he is Norway’s foremost musical extremist. Labelled “an elite musician” Or “an evolutionary wunderkind”, the global accolades have yet to impact his creativity with each and every album pushing boundaries and preconceived sounds typically assigned to heavy music.

attributes.title: SUNN O)))
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2e7hYqRjL82c1nIoREHc4J?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y20qC3qgpps?si=-sgFUvn0OCkPeyfQ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: SUNN O))) met en émoi notre façon de penser la musique depuis 1998 au moyen d’une synthèse de drone, de metal, de minimalisme et de maximalisme frôlant l'extase sonore pure. Des états de transe méditative, de la puissance, de la beauté et de légendaires vibrations. Une expérience sensorielle incomparable que les conditions live viennent impacter au centuple : ça risque de saigner abondamment des naseaux pendant le concert !

attributes.title: SUNN O)))
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2e7hYqRjL82c1nIoREHc4J?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y20qC3qgpps?si=-sgFUvn0OCkPeyfQ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: SUNN O))) have been challenging the ways we think about music since their inception in 1998. A synthesis of drone, metal, minimalism and maximalism verging on pure sonic ecstasy. They induce meditative trance states in the listener through the power, beauty and colour of sound pressure emanating from their legendary backline of valve amplification and their Earth-shaking tectonic compositions of existence, dedicated to the mysteries of life and the cosmos.

attributes.title: THY CATAFALQUE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4sgTqbA7htxYkRRJBPZIom?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yVdYLiEU8GU?si=MhXspw2K8hcC8qkl" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: La vision perçante de Tamás Kátai, l’homme-orchestre derrière le projet THY CATAFALQUE, est assurément hors du commun. Avec lui, les accords de Schengen ont un avenir radieux : aucune frontière n’existe pour sa création artistique. Un univers aussi vaste que volatile repousse sans cesse les directives parfois rigides de la musique extrême. Une aventure progressive s’offre à vous avec ce voyage dépaysant à la dimension onirique.

attributes.title: THY CATAFALQUE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4sgTqbA7htxYkRRJBPZIom?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yVdYLiEU8GU?si=MhXspw2K8hcC8qkl" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Tamás Kátai has a vision that extends beyond borders and boundaries. Even during its infancy, Thy Catafalque had already outgrown the rather rigid guidelines of black metal. Though only intended for the studio, over the past 20 years, his recording project has evolved into a lively collaboration. With each album, Thy Catafalque has pushed the envelope of extreme metal a step further, bringing the world’s most vile art form into conversation with the avant-garde.

attributes.title: WHITE WARD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/61D6KlxqzZEAWfD2CGc6Qp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7b_cNjfeV8g?si=UP77WtkH20n8Ssvu" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: S’adonner au black metal en maniant le saxophone sous sa forme la plus jazzy et en le rendant élément indispensable, c’est le tour de force réussi à la maestria par les Ukrainiens. Cette combinaison antinomique, signe d’une œuvre foncièrement avant-gardiste, ne sert qu’à magnifier le post-black metal du combo. Il est grand temps de vous aventurer sous la Temple pour y vivre une expérience unique et sombre. La noirceur dans toute sa splendeur !

attributes.title: WHITE WARD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/61D6KlxqzZEAWfD2CGc6Qp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7b_cNjfeV8g?si=UP77WtkH20n8Ssvu" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: WHITE WARD, from Odesa, Ukraine performs intensely deviant music of a noir shade. Formed in 2012 and taking root in raw depressive black metal, the band rapidly shed all boundaries, taking inspiration from an array of dark atmospheres including the writings of H.P. Lovecraft and I.M. Banks. Over the years, the WHITE WARD sound has evolved into a unique mix of post-black metal, deeply emotive soundscapes and expansive dark-Jazz atmospheres utilising perfectly fitting saxophone motifs.

attributes.title: CHAT PILE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4yRSUmhuSJ3KcIMljdh4fH?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/imc6v2s5p48?si=GuMt8Y0Ty15CERr0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: À l’instar des énormes monticules de déchets toxiques dont elle tire son nom, la musique du quatuor noise rock d’Oklahoma City est une incarnation suffocante et grotesque de l’angoisse existentielle qui définit le 21e siècle. La terreur a remplacé le rêve américain, et la musique de CHAT PILE est un rappel poignant de ce changement : la bande-son malsaine de notre planète mourante, d’une humanité à l’agonie. Froide, cruelle, sinistre.

attributes.title: CHAT PILE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4yRSUmhuSJ3KcIMljdh4fH?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/imc6v2s5p48?si=GuMt8Y0Ty15CERr0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Like the towering mounds of toxic waste from which it gets its namesake, the music of Oklahoma City noise rock quartet CHAT PILE is a suffocating, grotesque embodiment of the existential anguish that has defined the 21st Century. Dread has replaced the American dream, and CHAT PILE’s’s music is a poignant reminder of that shift – a portrait of an American rock band moulded by a society defined by its cold and cruel power systems.

attributes.title: MONKEY3
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/31GFg2x20JkksUlQxN9BMe?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LzsfJG5Udg0?si=7lVPLA5xrRLMD0b9" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Voici l'un des groupes de rock instrumental les plus excitants de la scène stoner et rock psychédélique. Le quatuor suisse enveloppe les auditeurs dans une brume sonore cosmique unique. C'est sombre et menaçant, évoquant une destruction mélancolique tout en étant en même temps débordant d'espoir, oscillant entre passages obsédants et breaks progressifs, grooves envoûtants et riffs colossaux. Superbe !

attributes.title: MONKEY3
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/31GFg2x20JkksUlQxN9BMe?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LzsfJG5Udg0?si=7lVPLA5xrRLMD0b9" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Instrumental psych rock frontrunners MONKEY3 are one of the most exciting instrumental rock bands in the modern stoner and psychedelic rock scene. MONKEY3 envelops listeners in their unique, cosmic auditory haze. It is dark and menacing, evoking melancholic destruction while somehow bursting with hope at the same time, moving between haunting passages and progressive breaks, mesmerizing grooves and colossal riffs.

attributes.title: ORANGE GOBLIN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3nutnJ57QnbWEdCWn2EyWo?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0zfO6QQTlpk?si=_Lmi8Iq8VUnkB8E7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Honnêtes, bosseurs, humbles, authentiques : les gars d’ORANGE GOBLIN sont aisément identifiables dans un monde alimenté par la superficialité et les clichés. Depuis 30 ans, ces irréductibles perpétuent inlassablement les valeurs d’un rock’n’roll burné, plombé au metal et parfumé au stoner bien gras. Force vive de la scène contemporaine de la perfide Albion, le combo n’a jamais été aussi puissant et inspiré qu’aujourd’hui. Et c’est tant mieux !

attributes.title: ORANGE GOBLIN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3nutnJ57QnbWEdCWn2EyWo?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0zfO6QQTlpk?si=_Lmi8Iq8VUnkB8E7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Honest, hard-working, humble and true, ORANGE GOBLIN are easy to spot in a world fuelled by bullshit. For the last 30 years, these London-based diehards have tirelessly flown the flag for balls-out heavy metal and maximum rock ‘n’ roll. Driven by passion, persistence and heartfelt love for metal’s dark magic, they have always been a vital force and a risk-free bet. Their contribution to British metal has been vast and enduring, earning them legendary, tribal treasure status among the denim ‘n’ leather legions of the UK and beyond.

attributes.title: SLOMOSA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0l7GXb53ndWn97ul8Hpfzd?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P2yc_U2Chlw?si=3ai1dsdp--dicZzM" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le désert rock à la moulinette norvégienne : voilà un plat qui ne manque pas de saveur ! Appliquant les grands préceptes universels du stoner avec un assaisonnement moins torride qu’en Californie, inspiré de sonorités grunge, de doom sabbathien et de coups de boutoir punks, SLOMOSA propose le tour de force de ravir les gourmands les plus voraces comme les gourmets les plus exigeants. Miam-miam !

attributes.title: SLOMOSA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0l7GXb53ndWn97ul8Hpfzd?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P2yc_U2Chlw?si=3ai1dsdp--dicZzM" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Norwegian desert rock: this is an intriguing dish that doesn't lack flavour, that’s for sure! Applying the great universal precepts of the classic California stoner genre, SLOMOSA manages to delight the most voracious gourmands and gourmets alike thanks to some additional ingredients: inspired grunge sounds, Sabbathian doom riffs and punk thrusts. Yum-yum!

attributes.title: TAR POND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4Uztr4l9SqJ4RWStTgPtIj?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ppiEf3JhTDs?si=XQKM7Bc_R8Rsm-3_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Projet initial de feu-Martin Ain (Celtic Frost), l’œuvre de TAR POND est à l’image de sa genèse : torturée et lugubre. S’immisçant au plus profond de l’âme humaine, l’édifice suisse martèle ses riffs comme autant de coups portés à votre enveloppe corporelle. Cultivant l’art du désespoir, il vous entraîne avec lui dans une vertigineuse expérience dérangeante et tourmentée. La parfaite bande-son d’une tristesse constante.

attributes.title: SOFT PLAY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3xByNj8XW17oW0wsJhgzYL?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nMOgilf4WX4?si=MHynK4WgABJ5xl2x" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Malgré une carrière sérieusement sinueuse marquée par un changement de nom (Slaves) et de nombreux uppercuts qui ont failli les mettre à terre pour de bon à maintes reprises, le duo infernal formé par Isaac et Laurie est toujours bien vivant et déterminé à en découdre avec un punk azimuté difficilement classable. Tout autant colérique que délicieusement pop, la mélopée entêtante de SOFT PLAY va marquer de nombreux points auprès des visiteurs de la Zone de Guerre.

attributes.title: SOFT PLAY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3xByNj8XW17oW0wsJhgzYL?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nMOgilf4WX4?si=MHynK4WgABJ5xl2x" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Despite a seriously winding career marked by a forced name change (Slaves) and numerous uppercuts that nearly brought them down for good on numerous occasions, the infernal duo formed by Isaac and Laurie is still alive and well and determined to fight with a crazy punk music that is difficult to classify as a genre. As angry as deliciously pop, the heady melody of SOFT PLAY will score many points with festivals-goers.

attributes.title: STREET DOGS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0spqoVkfVzRyAPmA6ZY5F9?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qQWobv8swkg?si=KwbezvWk_hzfSNfR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Quelle bonne surprise que de constater que ces chiens de la casse ont remis le couvert, et que leur appétit est décuplé pour l’occasion ! Au menu, un retour aux poncifs du genre avec du punk rock sans fioritures qui sent bon le parfum du caniveau et des pissotières. Ça montre les crocs et aboie à tout-va sur ceux qui le méritent (les politiciens, les nantis, l’autorité, les cons) et ça délivre des messages positifs appelant à l’unité pour tous les autres (nous !). Et bordel, qu’est-ce que ça fait du bien !

attributes.title: STREET DOGS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0spqoVkfVzRyAPmA6ZY5F9?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qQWobv8swkg?si=KwbezvWk_hzfSNfR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Seeing these junkyard dogs coming back to the forefront is excellent news! Especially since they are ready to bite and howl at the moon like never before! Punk rock without frills! As vindictive as ever, they condemn those who deserve it and deliver messages calling for unity. And it feels good!

attributes.title: TEEN MORTGAGE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4SX1RwkM82CQll2eoV9HaP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gYzlHEjgJBE?si=Le1EnvWuf-PSjiMZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Adoubé par l’Iguane, Mr. Iggy Pop himself (excusez du peu !), ce duo rageur dégaine un garage punk tapageur qui ne manquerait pas de faire sautiller le premier tétraplégique venu ou retrouver une seconde jeunesse à votre arrière-grand-père pour qui le Stannah ne deviendrait alors qu’un lointain souvenir. Brut, acerbe, TEEN MORTGAGE est la description sonore de l’absurdité de vivre à l’ère du capitalisme tardif et du féodalisme technologique.

attributes.title: TEEN MORTGAGE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4SX1RwkM82CQll2eoV9HaP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gYzlHEjgJBE?si=Le1EnvWuf-PSjiMZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Highly recommended by the godfather of punk, Iggy Pop, this angry duo spits out some rowdy garage punk rock music that would be sure to make a quadriplegic jump like a kangaroo. Raw, and mean, TEEN MORTGAGE is the sonic description of the absurdity of living in the era of capitalism and technological feudalism.

attributes.title: THE HELLACOPTERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1lsXuaLnHnfL7GoJXKkUtH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O3eU1s7KnA4?si=NBwP54JxJFR2PMtJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Un des plus beaux fleurons de la scène garage rock depuis des lustres. Et aussi un des groupes avec The Hives qui a su donner dans les années 90 un peu de coolitude à un style qui par essence se tient loin des projecteurs. De retour aux affaires en 2016 après un petit break salvateur, l’équipage est au meilleur de sa forme et ne manque pas une occasion d’activer la boite à gifles au son de décibels hurlants. Rock'n’roll !

attributes.title: THE HELLACOPTERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1lsXuaLnHnfL7GoJXKkUtH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O3eU1s7KnA4?si=NBwP54JxJFR2PMtJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: One of the most important bands in garage rock revival and a band who have made millions from badass licensing placements, who toured with KISS in the 90s and rose to fame with The Hives, THE HELLACOPTERS are the sort of band you can’t dismiss lightly. Back to their roots and better than ever, fans are going to go crazy for the bloodthirsty rock and roll magic that this band brings to the stage.

attributes.title: TURBONEGRO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/191rVxQbbZ05wcICUSvLkz?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Les bad boys norvégiens sont entrés depuis longtemps dans l’Histoire du rock n’roll, dont ils continuent de griffonner avec panache les plus belles pages. Grâce à son imagerie à l’esthétique irrévérencieuse (mais assumée et revendiquée) et son death-rock louche (un mélange détonnant de glam et de punk), dansant et dévergondé, l’équipage casquetté n’est comparable à nul autre dès lors qu’il investit les planches.

attributes.title: TURBONEGRO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/191rVxQbbZ05wcICUSvLkz?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WteGefeMiMc?si=tMLDHv9XpkyrCoCX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: TURBONEGRO is a Norwegian rock band known for their high-energy performances, irreverent humor, and fusion of punk rock with elements of glam and hard rock, which they coined as “deathpunk.” Their music is celebrated for its energy, attitude, and refusal to conform, making them a standout act in the world of rock.

attributes.title: ULTRA VOMIT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4mnp6YW545j0Qb5PYS9Wmv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_HtXHReDaTI?si=0LsQsnl0_RhcvqVm" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Ménestrels des temps modernes, bouffons du 21ᵉ siècle, troubadours contemporains. Pourtant, nos 4 Nantais semblent plutôt promis à prendre la place du roi. Un trône conquis après une âpre lutte à base de blagues potaches, d’humour douteux et scatophile à ses heures. Mais surtout, une place en haut de l’échiquier du metal tricolore gagnée avec un savoir-faire inégalé dès lors qu’il s’agit de parodier et singer les plus grands de la planète metal. Du grand art !

attributes.title: ULTRA VOMIT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4mnp6YW545j0Qb5PYS9Wmv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Modern day minstrels... 21st century jesters... Contemporary troubadours... Over the years, ULTRA VOMIT has become one of the finest jewels of the French metal scene. Thanks to their crap jokes, their toilet humour but also their talent in parodying the biggest metal groups on the planet above all. How far will they go?

attributes.title: ELECTRIC CALLBOY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1WNoKxsp715jez1Td4vthc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Depuis ses débuts prometteurs en 2010, ELECTRIC CALLBOY  as su s’imposer comme un acteur essentiel de la musique extrême contemporaine grâce à son audacieux et enthousiasmant mélange des genres alliant techno, deathcore, metalcore et indus. Aujourd’hui, rien ne semble en mesure de ralentir le sautillant combo rhénan dans son irrésistible ascension vers les sommets. Un grand moment de fête en perspective au rythme d’un electronicore débridé et désinhibé !

attributes.title: ELECTRIC CALLBOY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1WNoKxsp715jez1Td4vthc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/D1NdGBldg3w?si=JdHy-tcRuuZ8JTU8" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: ELECTRIC CALLBOY has been a force in the German music scene since its inception in 2020 and ais now rewriting today’s music scene with its unique blend of styles. The band’s innovative sound spans from mixing German Schlager with deathcore to hardstyle-influenced industrial metalcore and a post-hardcore take . The dynamic ELECTRIC CALLBOY demonstrates today is immense and seems unstoppable. In 2025, they will continue its rise with a headlining how at Hellfest proving its enduring appeal and cementing its place as a remarkable phenomenon in the music world.

attributes.title: IMMINENCE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7rqJQQxuUOCk052MK5kLsH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/91DhUliQk7o?si=9OZjvufTvUfNjOJD" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le metal scandinave nous a toujours habitués au noir, au sombre, au torturé, aux blastbeats par paquet de 12 et par-dessus tout à l’émergence de nouveaux sons. Avec IMMINENCE, l’innovation pointe à nouveau et prend la forme d’un metalcore à violon. Un son captivant, émouvant et plein de grâce. Respirez profondément et plongez dans les profondeurs d'une odyssée musicale loin des conventions.

attributes.title: IMMINENCE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7rqJQQxuUOCk052MK5kLsH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/91DhUliQk7o?si=9OZjvufTvUfNjOJD" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Scandinavian metal mainly deals with pain and darkness with plenty blastbeats and a lot of anger. With IMMINENCE, innovation is the key and takes the form of some sort of a bright metalcore with violins. A sound that is gripping, moving and full of grace. Take a deep breath and prepare yourself for a dive into the depths of an unconventional musical odyssey. Truly fantastic stuff.

attributes.title: KIM DRACULA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/526TMJFuJibm9j2p9td9Yp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Vous ne le savez pas encore, mais vous êtes déjà hypés par le nouveau phénomène de la scène metal. Sam Wellings, jeune Tasmanien de 26 ans, explose les dernières limites sous l’étiquette KIM DRACULA. Et après avoir conquis la sphère tiktokienne grâce à une reprise imparable du tube Paparazzi de la megastar Lady Gaga, le diablotin vient vous balancer en pleine face son neo-core-poppy-trap-goth-salsa-funk-death-heavy-electro metal.

attributes.title: KIM DRACULA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/526TMJFuJibm9j2p9td9Yp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wSkTmLe5kRQ?si=Q4JRsGdVMptxg1t7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: You may not know it yet, but you have been already hyped by this new phenomenon. Sam Wellings, a young 26-year-old Tasmanian, pushes boundaries with his project KIMDRACULA. His TikTok success with his fantastic cover of Lady Gaga’s mega-hit "Paparazzi" was only the beginning. The phenomenon continues to surprise thanks to his neo-core-poppy-trap-goth-salsa-funk-death-heavy-electro metal work!

attributes.title: SEVEN HOURS AFTER VIOLET
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/55VwLwkPAOGFgYdU3QwE8Z?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Si on vous dit Shavo Odadjian, vous nous répondez System Of A Down ? Et bien nous, on vous répond SEVEN HOURS AFTER VIOLET, le nouveau projet du bassiste du légendaire combo, entouré d’ex-Left To Suffer et Winds Of Plague. Plutôt qu’attendre désespérément un nouvel album des Arméno-Américains, on vous conseille fortement de venir vous encanailler au son d’un nu-metal de toute beauté qui va lancer les hostilités de cette édition comme il se doit !

attributes.title: SEVEN HOURS AFTER VIOLET
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/55VwLwkPAOGFgYdU3QwE8Z?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qVBdQDaKzGw?si=UsM86ff0acIEZAq7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: SEVEN HOURS AFTER VIOLET is the new project of Shavo Odadjian bassist of System Of A Down. Rather than desperately waiting for a new album from the Armenian-American gang, we strongly advise you to come and indulge in the sound of powerful nu-metal which will kick off this edition in the best possible way!

attributes.title: APOCALYPTICA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4Lm0pUvmisUHMdoky5ch2I?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Rg80u-TMNeE?si=X-fI4WgZgyabUlXa" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Atypique : assurément ! Surprenant : plus maintenant ! En effet, voilà déjà presque 30 ans qu'APOCALYPTICA a fait voler en éclat le cercle des musiques extrêmes armé alors seulement de violoncelles pour dépoussiérer des standards de Metallica. Et c’est toujours au sommet de leur art que les Finlandais reviennent nous offrir un set dédié aux titres des Four Horsemen. Un concert qui s’annonce aussi classieux qu’irrévérencieux !

attributes.title: APOCALYPTICA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4Lm0pUvmisUHMdoky5ch2I?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Rg80u-TMNeE?si=X-fI4WgZgyabUlXa" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Atypical: definitely! Surprising: not anymore! Almost 30 years since APOCALYPTICA exploded the codes governing extreme music only armed with cellos to enhance a few Metallica hits. At the top of their art, the Finns return to offer us a set dedicated to anthems of the Four Horsemen. A concert obviously eagerly awaited by everyone!

attributes.title: KORN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3RNrq3jvMZxD9ZyoOZbQOD?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wjttaL8y_DA?si=F_8fHhkUqNRKMliJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: 30 ans de carrière ce n’est pas rien. Être en plus, le précurseur, l’inventeur et encore actuellement le leader d’un courant musical, il y a lieu de s’incliner devant pareille prouesse. Jon Davis et sa bande dominent toujours la planète nu metal et ce n’est pas l'innombrable tripotée de groupes se revendiquant de l’influence du combo de Bakersfield qui dira le contraire. KORN, la force tranquille !

attributes.title: KORN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3RNrq3jvMZxD9ZyoOZbQOD?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wjttaL8y_DA?si=F_8fHhkUqNRKMliJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: 30 years of Korn. How great is that? The Bakersfield band is a precursor, an inventor and still the leader of the nu-metal movement, an unbridled mixture of metal, groove and rock. A unique band that cannot be imitated. Through the years, they have continued to push the limits of the alternative and metal genres, while remaining an essential reference for legions of fans and generations of artists around the globe. A true living legend.

attributes.title: TILL LINDEMANN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2a5G7JLmVJNjfFNg8rwLcP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Après un premier concert incandescent avec ses camarades de Rammstein à l’occasion de l’édition 2016, le colosse teuton revient poser ses imposantes bottes et ses costumes d’apparat au pays du muscadet. Il ne fera évidemment pas le voyage pour rien, avec un spectacle haut en couleurs forcément très à l’image de ce personnage croquignolet : un show syncopé et décalé, mêlant poésie, humour potache et (très) gros son avec une dimension festive exceptionnelle.

attributes.title: TILL LINDEMANN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2a5G7JLmVJNjfFNg8rwLcP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hPdDFx89fRs?si=Awg8JKqUp3epOeor" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: After a first show with Rammstein that was utterly incandescent at Hellfest in 2016, this colossus of German music returns once more to the land of Muscadet. With massive boots, costumes and a whole lot of fire one can prepare for a spectacle of massive proportions that highlights the unique and exciting image of this truly unique and potent artist. This will be a show that is full of the unexpected, blending toilet humour, poetry and massive volume.

attributes.title: NERVOSA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5D9d9xyLNQu32QVD9t4YqH?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oP9nI9cNREU?si=kriPtKntUR8tZthj" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Longtemps le strict apanage de mâles velus dégoulinant de testostérone, la scène thrash a été ces dernières années bousculée par des formations féminines qui ont su se faire une place avec des compos à la saveur délicieusement death et brutalement efficaces. Démonstration par l’exemple avec ce gang qui perpétue avec maestria la tradition brésilienne en la matière, en y adjoignant de délicates influences blackisantes bien senties.

attributes.title: NERVOSA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5D9d9xyLNQu32QVD9t4YqH?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oP9nI9cNREU?si=kriPtKntUR8tZthj" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Strict prerogative of hairy males dripping with testosterone for a long time, the thrash scene has in recent years been shaken up by female groups who have managed to make their place with songs with a delicious and effective death metal flavour. This gang is one great example. In doing so, these fierce ladies masterfully perpetuate the Brazilian tradition in this area, adding delicate, well-felt black metal influences.

attributes.title: 3 Inches of Blood
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0gNkDUN42nBxKOcpoF7iQ4?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JO7TZGgBbOw?si=8pp7leNFYrZvOqw8" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: On les croyait morts, enterrés et putréfiés depuis des lustres, mais ces Canadiens furibards sont bien vivants et ils bandent encore. On n’arrivera jamais à comprendre s’ils jouent du speed, du heavy, du power ou du thrash, mais on a bien compris que c’est du putain de metal furieux joué à fond la caisse, qui envoie le pâté et qui nique sa race (laissons notre maman de côté). Un retour bienvenu qui fait sacrément plaisir !

attributes.title: 3 Inches of Blood
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0gNkDUN42nBxKOcpoF7iQ4?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JO7TZGgBbOw?si=8pp7leNFYrZvOqw8" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: We thought they were dead, buried and putrefied for ages but these angry Canadians are very much alive and fucking kicking! Do they play speed, heavy, power or thrash metal? Who really cares?! Let’s just say that this is some epileptic metal played at full blast, that punches you in the face and kicks your arse. Welcome back, lads, you’ve been truly missed!

attributes.title: BURNING WITCHES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0eNuNAhL4dW2nvKbSe2mS8?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jaSlR30rlCs?si=cxpg5kE9VWxBy_K7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: En Suisse, "sorcière" ne rime point avec doigts crochus, verrue nasale ou chapeau pointu. Et encore moins avec rue Mouffetard ou placard à balai. Car il y a bien mieux avec les vaillantes BURNING WITCHES, un gang helvète 100% féminin qui perpétue avec verve, classe mais aussi grosses guitares l’œuvre des grandes pointures du heavy metal des années 80. Un revival décapant. Du Girl Power avec une bande-son vintage.

attributes.title: BURNING WITCHES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0eNuNAhL4dW2nvKbSe2mS8?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jaSlR30rlCs?si=cxpg5kE9VWxBy_K7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: In Switzerland, “witch” doesn’t necessarily mean hooked fingers, nasal wart, broom or pointy hat. Because there is much better than that to offer: the valiant BURNING WITCHES, a 100% female Swiss gang who perpetuate with verve, style and big guitars the work of the heavy metal superstars of the 80s. A searing revival. Girl Power with a vintage soundtrack.

attributes.title: EXODUS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/76S65NHJHrNy4JTrXHP2BH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ATx5k9E4sCU?si=Yq-xY_k2C9_0C-Mg" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Du sang, de la sueur, de la baston et de la bonne humeur ! Cinquième membre officieux du légendaire Big Four, le virulent quintet californien n’accuse aucune baisse de régime, aligne les brûlots et distribue les coups comme si sa dernière heure était arrivée. Et ça fait plus de 40 ans que ça dure ! Groupe plébiscité par le Syndicat des Dentistes, l’Amicale des Kinésithérapeutes et l’industrie plâtrière. La Sécurité sociale est moins fan.

attributes.title: EXODUS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/76S65NHJHrNy4JTrXHP2BH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Blood, sweat, brawl and good humour! Unofficial fifth member of the legendary Big Four, the virulent Californian quintet shows no sign of slowing down, delivering fast and aggressive song and smacking people as if its final hour has arrived. And it’s been going on for over 40 years! That band is acclaimed by the Union of Dentists, the Association of Physiotherapists and the whole plastering industry. National Health Service is less of a fan…

attributes.title: FURIES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2CTpnRLeP5jdtVPXlpZqdS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Grâce à son approche ingénieuse mêlant hard rock, heavy et thrash metal, la jeune formation francilienne semble actuellement inarrêtable dans sa progression inéluctable vers les sommets. Ça distribue avec le même enthousiasme les compositions méchantes comme une teigne que les envolées lyriques flamboyantes. Ça tricote des riffs à fond la caisse, ça martèle les fûts, ça agresse et ça caresse… Et on adore ça !

attributes.title: FURIES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2CTpnRLeP5jdtVPXlpZqdS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1JxdKyvcFEm7NqOmZDwyFo?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Le plus allemand des groupes français ! Avec son alliage de speed et de thrash metal, les Rennais s’imposent à l’évidence comme les cousins bretons de Destruction, Kreator et autres Sodom. Loin d’être un simple ersatz de groupes de la Ruhr, le combo ne fait pas dans l’auto-parodie lourdingue. Place à une efficacité sans faille servie par un sens de la mélodie (sacrément bien burné quand même !) en lorgnant habilement vers le heavy-metal. Bref, ça poutre avec style !

attributes.title: HEXECUTOR
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1JxdKyvcFEm7NqOmZDwyFo?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/l4QK7J4JOOI?si=1mSgG2BmI5eGBwOH" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The most German of French groups! With their combination of speed and thrash metal, the Rennes lads clearly stand out as the Breton cousins of Destruction, Kreator and Sodom. Far from being a simple ersatz, the combo does not engage in heavy self-parody and expresses their own vision. Make way for flawless efficiency served heavy metal melody.

attributes.title: SACRED REICH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0UeVJTdCWGEFSSO9Tg9tiH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
