attributes.content: Si son heure de gloire remonte aux années 80 et 90, SACRED REICH reste un acteur de premier plan en matière de zique qui défouraille. Proposant tout ce qu'un fan peut attendre et espérer en matière de thrash, la bande déploie une collection intemporelle composée de brûlots fulgurants, de groove écrasant, de solos meurtriers et de paroles engagées qui démontrent une véritable compréhension de tout ce qui compte le plus dans le monde d'aujourd'hui. Au final : un groupe qui compte plus que jamais.

attributes.title: SACRED REICH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0UeVJTdCWGEFSSO9Tg9tiH?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/awCqzmUVbQc?si=IfJktzgBFrnbROcS" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Formed in 1985, SACRED REICH were an integral part of the 80s and 90s thrash movement and they remain today a formidable force in metal. Showcasing everything a fan would expect and hope for great thrash metal, their work is a timeless collection comprised of blistering thrash, crushing grooves, killer solos and socially conscious lyrics that demonstrate a true understanding of everything that matters most in the world today.

attributes.title: TANKARD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0lKpKsvjBKLUeyVIAPHUy1?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NK6c58ZkJBo?si=D5-fC1ldJWAYnj4K" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Ça fait une paye que le combo de Francfort n’a pas quitté la culture de ses champs de saucisses pour venir ripailler sur les bords de la Sèvre et du Moine. Un retour forcément festif et avec les ingrédients simples qui en garantissent l’efficacité : un thrash metal rustique, un chanteur faisant autant office de hurleur que de bouffon, un enthousiasme communicatif et des hymnes à la gloire de la picole. Bref, tout ce qu’on apprécie sans la moindre modération.

attributes.title: TANKARD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0lKpKsvjBKLUeyVIAPHUy1?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NK6c58ZkJBo?si=D5-fC1ldJWAYnj4K" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: It has been a long time since the Frankfurt combo had abandoned the cultivation of its sausage fields to come and feast on the banks of the Sèvre and the Moine. A festive return to be with the simple ingredients that guarantee some good time: some rustic thrash metal, a singer who’s a screamer as well as a jester, an infectious enthusiasm and hymns to the glory of drinking. In short: everything we appreciate without the slightest moderation.

attributes.title: THE NIGHT ETERNAL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1psvDRjOvOPm4OthS5Fdwr?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/suCxxWXRKn8?si=FD88ugYEg6wmTD3D" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le néo-heavy metal aux saveurs délicieusement occultes de ces Teutons est terriblement entêtant ! Tout en s’inspirant de l’œuvre inquiétante et feutrée des défunts In Solitude et lorgnant avec mesure sur le Maiden des débuts, THE NIGHT ETERNAL développe des compositions épiques et inspirées, irradiées par un chant habité et lumineux. Une approche personnelle d’un genre codifié qui s’avère très rafraîchissante.

attributes.title: THE NIGHT ETERNAL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1psvDRjOvOPm4OthS5Fdwr?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/suCxxWXRKn8?si=FD88ugYEg6wmTD3D" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Classy neo-heavy metal with deliciously occult flavors! While drawing inspiration from In Solitude and early-Iron Maiden, THE NIGHT ETERNAL develops epic and inspired compositions, magnified by haunted vocals. A personal approach to a codified genre that turns out to be very refreshing.

attributes.title: IN EXTREMO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4MAvEYtgY8yNljGP697n4F?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8rFrwQFz6L0?si=9tfi-wYdyhacZSi8" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Plus que jamais et malgré les années qui passent (et les cheveux qui blanchissent et qui se veulent éparses), le toujours vaillant équipage berlinois fait fièrement et vigoureusement flotter la bannière d’un metal folk aux thématiques et sonorités médiévales. Gonflant les muscles avec la même aisance qu’il distille les mélodies, instruments d’époque à l’appui, IN EXTREMO démontre toute sa puissance et sa subtilité en live.

attributes.title: IN EXTREMO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4MAvEYtgY8yNljGP697n4F?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8rFrwQFz6L0?si=9tfi-wYdyhacZSi8" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: More than ever and despite the years that pass (and the hair turning white and straggly), the always valiant Berlin crew proudly and vigorously flies the banner of a folk metal with medieval themes and sounds. Pumping up the muscles with the same ease as it distils the melodies, supported by instruments of the period, IN EXTREMO demonstrates all its power and its subtlety in live conditions.

attributes.title: LUC ARBOGAST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6HM1zAsAmdbPo1ywO1GcT6?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/G-baoojvu1o?si=vyG8bNRhOxKYkf8t" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Véritable ménestrel des temps modernes, LUC ARBOGAST propose un périple inspirant à travers les âges où la richesse des thématiques et la finesse des structures musicales émerveillent et suscitent une admiration constante. Mélodies ancestrales, spiritualité et héritage féodal, orchestrés avec maestria dans une démarche sans le moindre opportunisme : l’œuvre d’un artiste singulier et très attachant.

attributes.title: LUC ARBOGAST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6HM1zAsAmdbPo1ywO1GcT6?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/G-baoojvu1o?si=vyG8bNRhOxKYkf8t" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: A true minstrel of modern times, LUC ARBOGAST offers an inspiring journey through the ages. The versatility of themes and the subtlety of musical structures never cease to arouse admiration. Ancestral melodies, spirituality and feudal heritage, all tastefully nested in an approach without of the slightest ounce of opportunism. The work of a singular and very endearing artist.

attributes.title: MÅNEGARM
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6jQgWQKirZ7IKDGN8fRtdA?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_E0hu6Y6jG4?si=C3zgV_sItVj5_ghd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Un des premiers groupes à avoir enrichi sa musique d’instruments traditionnels tels que le violon et la flûte, MÅNEGARM fait figure de pionnier mais aussi de survivant, ses collègues évoluant dans le même credo à l’époque ayant pour la plupart remisé au grenier leurs instruments et leurs rêves de carrière à rallonge. Les vétérans suédois excellent dans leurs expérimentations au service d’un pagan metal mélodique en perpétuelle évolution, et tendant vers la perfection, sans pour autant négliger puissance et fun.

attributes.title: MÅNEGARM
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6jQgWQKirZ7IKDGN8fRtdA?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_E0hu6Y6jG4?si=C3zgV_sItVj5_ghd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: One of the first groups to have enriched their music with traditional instruments such as the violin and the flute, MÅNEGARM is a pioneer but also a survivor. Many obands evolving in the same credo at the time have for the most part stored their attic instruments and their dreams of a long career. The Swedish veterans excel in their experiments in the service of a melodic pagan metal in perpetual evolution and tending towards perfection, without neglecting power and fun. Fan-tas-tic!

attributes.title: MORGARTEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4xKJfYRasExH6cgMmWlBpd?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/uuE9y_JvdQA?si=_oaxUX0OyXVPb3RI" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Préparez votre épée, votre bouclier ainsi que vos oreilles pour voyager avec ce combo suisse. Officiant dans un registre black metal épique/folk, MORGARTEN vous narre ses contes inspirés de l’Histoire, parfois sanglante, helvétique. Tirant son nom d’une bataille historique scellant en grande partie le destin de la Confédération, ces valeureux guerriers partent au combat défendre leur patrie à grands coups d’hymnes fédérateurs.

attributes.title: MORGARTEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4xKJfYRasExH6cgMmWlBpd?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/uuE9y_JvdQA?si=_oaxUX0OyXVPb3RI" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: MORGARTEN is a Swiss black epic/folk metal band who invite you to follow their tales and legends inspired by Swiss history. During the concerts, the audience is invited to discover their stories through a brutal and atmospheric performance! When the heaviness of war subsides, a catchy folk melody lulls the audience’s heart. Raise your swords and prepare for battle!

attributes.title: PERCHTA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/18PQtAJFJ5BBxBnMcysR2O?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qKmKRzGl9WU?si=tAVK7HDN3SeTgGF7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Un groupe de plus au sein d’une scène folk pagan gargouillant à foison de groupes balourds mêlant tradition, gros son, maquillage et costume d’époque ? Que nenni ! Portant en étendard une déesse de la végétation et de la fertilité, la troupe célèbre avec intelligence et conviction la mythologie tyrolienne, mais aussi la féminité et les combats des femmes au quotidien. Un groupe inspirant au potentiel insondable.

attributes.title: PERCHTA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/18PQtAJFJ5BBxBnMcysR2O?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qKmKRzGl9WU?si=tAVK7HDN3SeTgGF7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Another clumsy folk metal outfit mixing tradition, big sound, make-up and period costume? Nay! Named after a goddess of vegetation and fertility from Germanic mythology, the troupe celebrates with intelligence and conviction Tyrolean mythology but also femininity, feminism and women’s daily struggles. An inspiring group with unfathomable potential.

attributes.title: SKILTRON
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4ijzdQPQtKqKGXx762wQJN?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O8W5VH8YWX8?si=mBNtOTHNPT4Uy93h" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: La culture celte semble universelle, et ce n’est certainement pas un petit océan de rien du tout qui pourra l’arrêter. Ces 5 Argentins se la sont accaparée avec une telle facilité que leur folk metal teinté de power sent le whisky et les Highlands à plein nez. Tirant son nom d’une technique ancestrale de guerre écossaise, SKILTRON vous enjoint de venir avec lui, lance en avant, afin de repousser et terrasser l’ennemi !

attributes.title: SKILTRON
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4ijzdQPQtKqKGXx762wQJN?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O8W5VH8YWX8?si=mBNtOTHNPT4Uy93h" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Celtic culture is global and no ocean can stop it. SKILTRON is a folk metal band formed in Buenos Aires in 2004, now relocated to Europe. The group is considered one of the few Southern American metal bands to fuse heavy metal and Celtic music, a style usually more common in many parts of Europe. Taking their name from an ancestral Scottish war technique, SKILTRON will bring all the power of the bagpipes of war to Hellfest! Prepare for battle!

attributes.title: SOWULO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4BkdqpIEhl0tKZ5xpAo5pR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: SOWULO ("Soleil" en proto-germanique) est la créature du multi-instrumentiste et compositeur Faber Horbach, artiste déterminé à exprimer son chemin spirituel à travers son art. Au son d'une musique créée avec des instruments traditionnels et contemporains, le créateur et l'auditeur sont mis au défi de faire un voyage intérieur et d'invoquer la sagesse archétypale du plus profond d'eux-mêmes. Une invitation à la célébration de notre grand héritage païen.

attributes.title: SOWULO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4BkdqpIEhl0tKZ5xpAo5pR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xbkxmVB41JA?si=plw2mDfTKFJybocJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: SOWULO (Sun" in proto-germanic) is the work of multi-instrumentalist and composer Faber Horbach. Captivated by the cyclical nature of existence and an animistic worldview, Faber is determined to express his spiritual path through his music. With lyrics in Anglo-Saxon and music created with both historical and contemporary instruments, the creator and listener are challenged to go on an inner journey and to invoke archetypical wisdom from deep within. An invitation to celebrate our great pagan heritage.

attributes.title: TROLLFEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2GkRxQ8FEGrWxU8BjZKfmh?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Ça va guincher dans les grandes largeurs sous la Temple ! Les bardes norvégiens sont en charge de l’animation de la kermesse du Champ Louet et prennent leur tâche très à cœur ! Sarabandes endiablées, hymnes à la picole, à la ripaille ou aux flamants roses, lâchage massif de caisses malodorantes, chenilles improvisées : ce concert s’annonce comme un moment de vie festif, au son d’un folk-metal incisif et à la bonne humeur contagieuse !

attributes.title: TROLLFEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2GkRxQ8FEGrWxU8BjZKfmh?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Big party ahead! The Norwegian bards are in charge of the entertainment at Clisson’s fun fair! And they’re pretty serious about it! Wild sarabands, hymns to boozing, feasting or pink flamingos. Lets enjoy ourselves with smelly farts, pints of beer, improvised congas: this is going to be a festive moment for us all!

attributes.title: WIND ROSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/67ps5pbKVO7V9Fcb4lTIXz?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Pendant que certains grandissent avec Disney en regardant Blanche-Neige, d’autres leur préfèrent l’univers de Tolkien et son Seigneur des Anneaux. Au vu du look de nos Italiens, le doute n’est pas permis. Comme Gimli, ils prennent tout droit le chemin tortueux des mines de la Moria. Et c’est hache à la main que ces 5 guerriers partent au combat pour prendre d’assaut la Temple. Amateurs de power metal, accueillons-les à bras ouverts au sein de la communauté.

attributes.title: WIND ROSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/67ps5pbKVO7V9Fcb4lTIXz?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Exploding onto the scene with viral appearances on TikTok, Italian dwarven power metal army WIND ROSE have solidified their reputation as a powerhouse in the modern power metal scene. The perfect blend of signature party anthems alongside select deeper, more serious tracks: an unforgettable journey through the caves of metal, capturing the epic, medieval spirit of the dwarves!

attributes.title: ÅRABROT "RITE OF DIONYSUS"
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1vKXAkXBGSbjgGcOPYLI6j?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: C’est l'histoire de Kjetil, un noise rocker norvégien, et de Karin, une princesse de la pop suédoise, mariés au nom du rock'n'roll. Ils se sont donné pour mission de prêcher la liberté, la luxure et la passion à travers leur musique unique. ÅRABROT explore l’existentialisme et vient présenter sa propre histoire, mise en scène dans un show inédit et grandiose. Un spectacle musical passionné, une mise en abyme d’un amour passionnel.

attributes.title: ÅRABROT "RITE OF DIONYSUS"
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1vKXAkXBGSbjgGcOPYLI6j?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xmGN7JUfZkA?si=w0h1JOiWoxasQnce" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Årabrot is Kjetil “Tall Man” Nernes and Karin “Dark Diva” Park. They live in the countryside with their two children in an old church. Rock’n roll is their religion. Kjetil is a survivor. After stalking the blackened, grimey European noise rock underground for years, a rupturing change came in the form of serious illness in 2014. After contracting a rare and aggressive form of cancer, he nearly died; but the lengthy, painful experience of treatment and recovery gave him the time and space to reconsider his entire life… including his artistic practice.

attributes.title: CASTLE RAT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2g5gjeZJLGcWPAF0o9KdJj?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xp-8USQQc1Q?si=T7LBVcPpR59dNxMd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Aux pénibles et autres relous qui ne jurent que par les étiquettes, on dira que CASTLE RAT est "du Black Sabbath avec des épées". Ou leur refourguer un bon "Medieval Fantasy Doom Metal" des familles. Et aux amateurs de sonorités lugubres et vintages, que le décapant quartet de Brooklyn est sans conteste leur prochain groupe préféré, si ce n’est pas déjà le cas. Un groupe étonnant et détonnant, à l’imagerie singulière, à découvrir de toute urgence !

attributes.title: CASTLE RAT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2g5gjeZJLGcWPAF0o9KdJj?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xp-8USQQc1Q?si=T7LBVcPpR59dNxMd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: To boring sods and other idiots who need tags, we will say that CASTLE RAT is “Black Sabbath with swords”. Or give them “Medieval Fantasy Doom Metal ». And to lovers of lugubrious and vintage sounds, we will tell that the stripping quartet from Brooklyn is undoubtedly their next favourite group, if it is not already the case. An astonishing and explosive combo with unique imagery to discover urgently!

attributes.title: DIRTY SOUND MAGNET
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4xRdcudb8V909KuVer6gko?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nm6I5Ok_mxM?si=XwSZx7CdZGfCMZ6D" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le trio fribourgeois continue inlassablement de retrousser ses manches à la gloire du psychédélisme. La sensation rock helvétique nous propose un périple musical des plus endiablés, un voyage mystique à l’énergie débordante porté par un son chaud, hypnotique et diablement bluesy. Ensorcelés, vous succomberez à l’émotion, à la magie et au groove prodigués par ces sorciers, qui vous plongeront inéluctablement dans un état second.

attributes.title: DIRTY SOUND MAGNET
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4xRdcudb8V909KuVer6gko?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nm6I5Ok_mxM?si=XwSZx7CdZGfCMZ6D" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Rock sensation of the moment, DIRTY SOUND MAGNET offers a mystical journey with boundless energy. Emotion, magic and groove are present in stage performances that never disappoint. Their show is unpredictable: shamanic stage presence, rock star charisma, instrumental prowess, poetic singing, enticing dynamics. Expect the unexpected.

attributes.title: DOPETHRONE
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vhbts9e7iWs?si=yUsI8Nq1xUHWfBUG" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Originaire des bas-fonds de Montréal, ce trio un brin démoniaque a pour seul but de faire l’éloge du sale et du crasseux. Une ode poisseuse servie par un doom narcotique grisant, suant à grosses gouttes le sludge bas du front. Et c’est les deux pieds dans la boue que les trois Canadiens s’en donnent à cœur joie pour nous souiller de leurs riffs vicelards, balançant bûche sur bûche. De quoi se chauffer tout l’hiver !

attributes.title: DOPETHRONE
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vhbts9e7iWs?si=yUsI8Nq1xUHWfBUG" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: DOPETHRONE is a three-piece band from Montreal, Quebec, known for their abrasive mix of sludge and doom metal with lyrics dealing with self-destruction, cannabis, sleazy drug abuse and the macabre (so lovely!). Influenced by rock n roll, punk, black metal, and blues, the band refers to their music as "Slutch", the Canadian term for cold sludge, a.k.a. dirty mud snow. They once described it as "frozen sludge, snow covered in addiction, blood, tears, and broken dreams".

attributes.title: MASTERS OF REALITY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6I96egIonnFBY26MprKYKb?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fBU6qBD2AxA?si=NbuNWcp4sDdp65-x" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Chris Goss est l'un des génies insaisissables de la musique américaine. Chanteur, guitariste et force motrice de MASTERS OF REALITY, il a passé plus de 40 ans à tracer son propre parcours musical, voyageant du blues mystique au rock du désert en passant par la beauté aux accents psychédéliques, et tous les points intermédiaires. Là où d'autres suivent le mouvement, le Californien a forgé une carrière unique.

attributes.title: MASTERS OF REALITY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6I96egIonnFBY26MprKYKb?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fBU6qBD2AxA?si=NbuNWcp4sDdp65-x" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Chris Goss is one of the elusive geniuses of American music. As the singer, guitarist and driving force behind MASTERS OF REALITY, he’s spent more than 40 years charting his own musical journey, travelling from mystical blues to desert rock to psychedelia-edged beauty via all points in between. Where others follow the pack, this desert-dwelling California native has forged a career like no other.

attributes.title: PENTAGRAM
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0xybuiDEYo3YuT3fLPaIyE?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5evUJ7-9UOU?si=lTcF19tGO3i2ZbPX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: L’ineffable Bobby Liebling est décidément increvable. Et ce ne sont ni un coupable oubli de dentier, ni des contrariétés médicales ou judiciaires qui lui cloueront le clapet et le confineront à une vie en EHPAD. Plus que jamais, le fantasque septuagénaire se veut le révérend déglingué au regard halluciné et hallucinant prêchant les vices et les petites vertus d’un doom metal qui transpire l’occultisme à très grosses gouttes. 100% culte. 666% occulte.

attributes.title: PENTAGRAM
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0xybuiDEYo3YuT3fLPaIyE?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5evUJ7-9UOU?si=lTcF19tGO3i2ZbPX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: There is only one and only Bobby Liebling. And the ineffable Bobby is truly indestructible. Medical or/and legal annoyances won’t shut him down and confine him to a life in a nursing home. More than ever, the septuagenarian fanatic is the broken-down reverend who preaches with a hallucinatory look the vices and virtues of a doom metal. 100% cult. 666% occult.

attributes.title: WORMSAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2V6sou5scnFxTTki6jVO5M?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_WS8dFIG-i8?si=UcZAMAA48ImF6SpW" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le trio mentonnais a trouvé le juste équilibre entre la lourdeur sombre du sludge, la rugosité du grunge et le gras suintant du stoner mais toujours empreint de mélancolie. S’il revendique des références telles que Yob, Monolord et Alice In Chains, il se démarque par son approche sonore audacieuse marquée notamment par une dualité vocale posée sur un mur de riffs dont l’épaisseur vous ferait passer l’hiver au chaud.

attributes.title: WORMSAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2V6sou5scnFxTTki6jVO5M?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_WS8dFIG-i8?si=UcZAMAA48ImF6SpW" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Stoner/sludge band formed in Menton in 2018 by Julien Coppo, Clément Mozzone and Tom Valstar. The band has quickly laid down the characteristics of their sound: massive slow rhythms, interspersed with more ethereal moments backed by singing alternating between the harsh vocals of Julien, and the more aerial ones of Clément.

attributes.title: SANDRIDER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1SpoJnDz0rYpORXYFYg64j?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VEeXNnDqTSY?si=0g2Y2K_MN8hK0CTe" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Avec 2 ex-Akimbo aux commandes et un son aussi lourd et accrocheur que les meilleurs tubes de Red Fang ou Torche, on se demande encore comment SANDRIDER a pu passer sous le radar de la plupart. Avec un talent indéniable pour pondre des refrains entêtants et un sens inné de la mélodie, le trio de Seattle va indubitablement se mettre le public dans la poche dès le 1er riff. Du groove en-veux-tu, en voilà !

attributes.title: SANDRIDER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1SpoJnDz0rYpORXYFYg64j?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VEeXNnDqTSY?si=0g2Y2K_MN8hK0CTe" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: With 2 ex-Akimbo at the helm and a sound as heavy and catchy as the best hits of Red Fang or Torche, we still wonder how SANDRIDER was able to slip under the radar of most. With an undeniable talent for creating catchy choruses and an innate sense of melody, the Seattle trio will undoubtedly conquer the public from its first riff!

attributes.title: BÉTON ARMÉ
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7B9AYoMBJAGlHtB97cPt9z?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nIdSPq5G1QU?si=pkEzdjwTqje0nCrc" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: On le croirait tout droit sorti des années 80, celles du meilleur de la oï tricolore. Pourtant, il trouve son origine en plein Covid et du côté de chez nos cousins québécois, qui plus est. Prêt à se battre pour sa vie, le combo, aussi nerveux et abrasif que sa musique, incarne le punk avec une dévotion sans faille et un esprit de rébellion intact. À travers un son acerbe et rugueux, BÉTON ARMÉ entend lutter contre l’ordre établi !

attributes.title: BÉTON ARMÉ
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7B9AYoMBJAGlHtB97cPt9z?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nIdSPq5G1QU?si=pkEzdjwTqje0nCrc" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: This fantastic oi! music seems to be coming straight from France in the 1980’s. However, it has its origins traced back in Quebec during the Covid period. Ready to fight for their lives, the combo and their nervous and abrasive music embody punk music with unfailing devotion and a true spirit of rebellion. BÉTON ARMÉ intends to fight against the established order!

attributes.title: CHUBBY AND THE GANG
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/54owRfib7AwmLx1OEM1Apd?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Menée par l’électricien local Charlie Manning, la petite troupe du sud de Londres oscille entre un état d’esprit occasionnellement orienté vers le mode "on s’en branle", mais aussi et surtout une attitude "allez vous faire foutre" très active. Doigtant son punk rock avec des sonorités pop-rétro bien senties, elle propose un résultat revitalisant grâce à un équilibre pertinent d’énergie brute et de mélodies irrésistibles.

attributes.title: CHUBBY AND THE GANG
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/54owRfib7AwmLx1OEM1Apd?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kfHfvOPa_mM?si=QSiRYvYsw8-JU3JX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: CHUBBY AND THE GANG are a West London punk troupe comprised of members of various bands associated with The New Wave of British Hardcore, among them Violent Reaction, Abolition, Big Cheese and more. The band – helmed by local electrician Charlie Manning – developed a cult following in the UK, largely rooted in the cross-pollinating nature of the punk scene.

attributes.title: LEFTÖVER CRACK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3mqzUSlXfwU4J7ztz5u6OP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Revoilà les déjantés New-Yorkais et leur anarcho ska-punk-hardcore hautement politisé, mais jamais avare d’humour. Critique, cynique et toujours hargneux, LEFTÖVER CRACK c’est toujours une lutte des classes où tous les puissants de ce monde en prennent pour leur grade. Mais rassurez-vous, vous ne serez pas épargnés car leur set s’annonce comme une grosse tarte que vous allez vous aussi prendre en pleine tronche.

attributes.title: LEFTÖVER CRACK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3mqzUSlXfwU4J7ztz5u6OP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: The New Yorker madmen bring the house down with their venomous punk rock with ska influences from time to time. And their protest lyrics against politicians and inequalities. A critical, cynical, angry speech of course. But not without humour and tongue in cheeks. Everyone gets the beating they deserve to the sound of a vibrant music.

attributes.title: LES GARÇONS BOUCHERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7gUAB3cvO42nbKY0mulGVU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Attention, grand moment de partage bourru en perspective ! Avec le plaisir de pouvoir beugler à pleins poumons des hymnes glorifiant l’absorption effrénée d’une boisson qui mousse ou traitant de la dégustation de chair humaine. Mais aussi un moment de fraternité organisé par ses potes pour célébrer l’esprit et l’œuvre d’un artiste hors-norme parti trop tôt : le seul et unique François Hadji-Lazaro. Chapeau l’artiste et merci pour tout !

attributes.title: LES GARÇONS BOUCHERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7gUAB3cvO42nbKY0mulGVU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: A great moment of gruff celebration in perspective! Let’s celebrate and sings odes to beer and human flesh consumption and other oddities to the sound of some very peculiar and festive French punk rock. But also a moment of fraternity organised by friends to celebrate the spirit and work of an extraordinary artist who died much too soon: the one and only François Hadji-Lazaro. Hats off to the artist and thanks again for everything!

attributes.title: LION'S LAW
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7JVEe7dW62EeMOrMwmwG68?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOMPQLuFoCI?si=Lo44j-BVk7p937uk" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Grâce à son éthique de travail exemplaire et son humilité, LION'S LAW est devenu une force dominante de la scène punk européenne contemporaine et au-delà. Cocorico ! Et rien ne semble freiner sa progression fulgurante. Sa musique musclée et fédératrice comble tout autant les baffles des fans de oï, de streetpunk que de hardcore et ses concerts sont un terrain fertile à l’interprétation d’hymnes à brailler un poing en l’air pendant que l’autre pogne serre un gobelet.

attributes.title: LION'S LAW
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7JVEe7dW62EeMOrMwmwG68?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOMPQLuFoCI?si=Lo44j-BVk7p937uk" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: LION’S LAW are a dominant force in today's European punk scene. Playing shows around the world, headlining big Oi! and Punk Festivals, these boys are an unstoppable machine. No boundaries exist when we talk about LION’S LAW. Take a blender, toss in some classic Oi!, streetpunk and hardcore, and get ready to enjoy a completely fresh flavour of raised fists and powerful sing-alongs.

attributes.title: MIKE MCCOLGAN AND THE BOMB SQUAD
attributes.content: Les fans des Dropkick Murphys ont remarqué avec une lueur gourmande dans les yeux la présence sur l’affiche du chanteur original du gang bostonien, accompagné de son escouade de démineurs. Et le lascar n’a pas pour mission d’enfiler (ni de lâcher) des perles, mais de se livrer à l’interprétation de l’intégralité du séminal et légendaire Do Or Die. Concert forcément mémorable !

attributes.title: MIKE MCCOLGAN AND THE BOMB SQUAD
attributes.content: Dropkick Murphys fans immediately noticed a name on this 2025 poster: that of the original singer of the Boston gang and his his bomb squad. This concert promises to be exceptional and will be remembered since he will perform the entire seminal and legendary Do Or Die album !

attributes.title: SEX PISTOLS & FRANK CARTER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/17lv1Ruxq46ZK5xAINAX8J?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.content: Le plus mythique groupe de l’Histoire du punk rebranche les amplis et s’encanaille avec le meilleur frontman de la scène punk contemporaine pour faire péter le plus grand album de punk rock de tous les temps ! Ignorons les gardiens du temple et les pisse-froid, et réjouissons-nous de voir Steve Jones, Paul Cook, Glenn Matlock tapisser la bande-son et le furieux Frank Carter éructer les hymnes venimeux de Nevermind The Bollock’s, Here’s The Sex Pistols.

attributes.title: SEX PISTOLS & FRANK CARTER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/17lv1Ruxq46ZK5xAINAX8J?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.content: The most legendary group in the history of punk joins forces with the best frontman of the contemporary punk scene to rock the house while playing he greatest punk rock album of all time! Let's ignore the keepers of the flame and  look forward to seeing Steve Jones, Paul Cook, Glenn Matlock perform alongside Frank Carter the venomous anthems of Nevermind The Bollox's, Here's The Sex Pistols.

attributes.title: THE DAMNED
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6VeL8VhaMjHTPc5uovFl3h?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TUxFQ5QBiYk?si=cJEZYJPT7njI1FK4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les indécrottables punks de THE DAMNED continuent de vaillamment brandir le drapeau de l'originalité, de lever le majeur face à l’adversité et de célébrer une philosophie DIY punk face au divertissement médiocre et la réalité scénarisée. Près de 50 ans après sa création, ce combo légendaire demeure encore et toujours un groupe live incroyable qui sonne aussi frais et excitant qu'en 1976. L’exploit n’est pas mince !

attributes.title: THE DAMNED
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6VeL8VhaMjHTPc5uovFl3h?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TUxFQ5QBiYk?si=cJEZYJPT7njI1FK4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Always unforgettable, THE DAMNED continue to wave the flag for originality, stick two fingers up to mediocrity and celebrate a DIY punk ethos in the face of plastic entertainment and scripted reality. Nearly 50 years since their inception, but here they are – as their loyal following will attest - still an incredible live band who sound as fresh and exciting as they did way back in 1976.

attributes.title: THE REAL MCKENZIES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1YczG6BNjM9XAnw64RqnXi?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Un Hellfest ne serait pas un Hellfest sans inscription à sa programmation de l’un des fleurons du punk rock celtique. Cerise sur le gâteau cette année puisque ce sont THE REAL MCKENZIES qui s’y collent. Si les titulaires d’une licence de géo ne manqueront pas de pointer du doigt la nationalité canadienne de ces forbans et de contester leur celtitude, ils seront malgré tout les premiers à rejoindre le pit et à s’éclater au son des guitares et de la cornemuse.

attributes.title: THE REAL MCKENZIES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1YczG6BNjM9XAnw64RqnXi?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KYNMGR1HMrs?si=LxNuLgIxzeAV55dP" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: A Hellfest wouldn't be a Hellfest without one of the jewels of Celtic punk rock on its poster. And we are pleased to welcome THE REAL MCKENZIES in 2025. Some dudes will probably point out the Canadian nationality of these rascals and want to challenge their true Celtic roots. Well, they will be the first ones to join the pit and have fun to the sound of guitars and bagpipes in the Warzone area.

attributes.title: AMIRA ELFEKY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6Z4kwq0LOaYQW2CqudoOIk?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/c3F4GAetrMg?si=N9Zd4JXKY4umRQF5" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Alimentée par une passion inébranlable, AMIRA ELFEKY souffle un vent de fraîcheur et représente le renouveau de la scène heavy rock malgré des influences musicales fortement ancrées dans les années 2000. Véritable introspection, sa musique est une invitation à partager les aspects les plus intimes de son être et à embrasser l'essence de la connexion humaine. Un voyage à travers son état mental, entre chaos et sérénité.

attributes.title: AMIRA ELFEKY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6Z4kwq0LOaYQW2CqudoOIk?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/c3F4GAetrMg?si=N9Zd4JXKY4umRQF5" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Fueled by an unwavering passion, AMIRA ELFEKY embodies the revival of the heavy rock scene despite musical influences strongly anchored in the 2000s. Her music is an invitation to share her most intimate thoughts. A sensitive journey between chaos and serenity.

attributes.title: CHARLOTTE WESSELS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6yyPaE45AE346XVgFJgiaI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qGiQf6ubt08?si=5NC4LV4qH8H_3koW" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: En quittant Delain en 2021, la Néerlandaise s’est affranchie de toute contrainte artistique. Pas facile, pourtant, de se débarrasser de son étiquette « chanteuse de » quand votre visage incarne à ce point un groupe, un style. Mais débordante de créativité et avec son timbre exceptionnel, elle nous propose une œuvre audacieuse et introspective pour se construire sa propre identité et se faire un nom que vous n’êtes pas près d’oublier !

attributes.title: CHARLOTTE WESSELS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6yyPaE45AE346XVgFJgiaI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qGiQf6ubt08?si=5NC4LV4qH8H_3koW" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The Dutch vocalist freed herself from all artistic constraints by leaving Delain in 2021. It is complicated to move forward when your face and your voice fully embody your former group. But thanks to her creativity and her exceptional tone, she achieves this successfully. She offers us a bold, introspective work which shows her own identity. CHARLOTTE WESSELS: a name you won't soon forget!

attributes.title: EPICA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5HA5aLY3jJV7eimXWkRBBp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P_Ys_W7ySkM?si=5ew0eBh09m6niBrh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Fer de lance de la scène symphonique européenne, EPICA accomplit un parcours artistique tout simplement bluffant d’inspiration et d’intégrité. Fièrement attaché à ses racines extrêmes et à la dualité des vocaux growlés de Mark Jansen et des envolées lyriques de la flamboyante Simone Simons, le groupe peut s’enorgueillir d’une œuvre solide aux ambiances contrastées et aux structures réfléchies.

attributes.title: EPICA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5HA5aLY3jJV7eimXWkRBBp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P_Ys_W7ySkM?si=5ew0eBh09m6niBrh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The tip of the spear of the symphonic metal scene alongside bands like Within Temptation, EPICA have crafted an artistic vision defined by potent inspiration and integrity. Faithfully tied to their roots and wonderfully balancing the growled vocals of Mark Jense with the soaring lyrics and flamboyant performances of Simone Simons, the band has found a path for themselves that is full of dynamic diversity and relentlessly catchy songs.

attributes.title: FUTURE PALACE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4QnuZOyl4C9d1keyOZXJ21?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oEyc4vg40Pk?si=9ebsrJ2IGgSyVpLX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: L’étoile montante de la scène post-hardcore moderne vient étaler son talent et donner un souffle nouveau au genre. Les breaks metalcore puissants se mêlent aux rythmes tremblants du darkwave, les refrains émo-core hymniques se confrontent avec les chœurs sacrés, la froideur industrielle se heurte à l’émotivité pesante. Une alternance entre chaud et froid. FUTURE PALACE : le metal moderne dans toute sa splendeur.

attributes.title: FUTURE PALACE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4QnuZOyl4C9d1keyOZXJ21?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
