attributes.content: The rising star of the modern post-hardcore scene breathes new life into the genre! Powerful metalcore breaks mingle with darkwave rhythms. Anthemic emo-core choruses mix with sacred choirs. Industrial coldness collides with heavy emotionality. An alternation between hot and cold. FUTURE PALACE: modern metal in all its glory.

attributes.title: HEILUNG
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7sTKZr30LqC928DZ5P9mNQ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SVbc_Fwbt50?si=4d67s-WP6vq9Xjbs" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les guerriers danois sont devenus en quelques années une référence de la scène neo-folk. Il faut dire que leur invitation au sein de leur univers musical s’avère une expérience aussi turbulente qu’apaisante. Un voyage chamanique dans lequel votre esprit et votre corps viendront se perdre pour ne former plus qu’un. Un retour à la terre dans une atmosphère primitive et bestiale. C’est une cérémonie de toute beauté qui vous attend !

attributes.title: HEILUNG
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7sTKZr30LqC928DZ5P9mNQ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SVbc_Fwbt50?si=4d67s-WP6vq9Xjbs" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: In the space of a few years, the Danish warriors have become a reference in the neo-folk scene. It must be said that their invitation into their musical universe proves to be an experience as turbulent as soothing. A shamanic journey in which your mind and your body will become one. A return to the Earth in a primitive and vibrant atmosphere. A beautiful ceremony awaits you!

attributes.title: KITTIE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0ImEDe9tW5n4pxHOK39zIc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ScQ0PgxXL-w?si=hHw-YR8B2PUC_ttN" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Durant les années dorées du nu-metal, un nouveau combo apparaissait chaque semaine avec, il faut bien l’avouer, un degré de créativité bien trop souvent proche du zéro. Pas facile alors de se démarquer face à cette opulence. Pourtant, un groupe de 4 Canadiennes a marqué les esprits et c’est un immense plaisir de les voir reprendre du service, plus fortes et talentueuses que jamais et certainement pas là pour plaisanter !

attributes.title: KITTIE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0ImEDe9tW5n4pxHOK39zIc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ScQ0PgxXL-w?si=hHw-YR8B2PUC_ttN" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: For those that were on board from the beginning, KITTIE was considered part of the nu-metal movement. Before being labelled as a serious full-on metal outfit. Just as they seemed to be hitting their stride six albums into their career, however, KITTIE slowly disappeared from the scene. The silence was eventually dubbed an “indefinite hiatus”. Now, 13 years later, that silence has been broken in earnest.

attributes.title: SPIRITBOX
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4MzJMcHQBl9SIYSjwWn8QW?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/80VTmBAnTSE?si=-_lK_dWWca0hxzDu" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Si la trop courte performance de 2022 a marqué les esprits non préparés et rougi bien des joufflus à l’heure de l’apéro dominical, le tabassage en règle de 2025 s’annonce massif et sans concession. Cette fois, la punition sera aussi sévère que possible. Dépositaires d’un metal contemporain sautillant et hargneux, les versatiles teignes canadiennes feront souffler le chaud et le froid avec un sens du show inégalé.

attributes.title: SPIRITBOX
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4MzJMcHQBl9SIYSjwWn8QW?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/80VTmBAnTSE?si=-_lK_dWWca0hxzDu" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The band's concert in 2022 was very intense but unfortunately much too short. The public was nevertheless won over. In 2025, the concert promises to be massive and uncompromising. Thanks to their bouncy and snarling modern metal, the versatile Canadian ringworms will shake up the crowd like never before. We will see you there!

attributes.title: SUN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5EjzvshGaeIYnjdttJF6ZQ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bnHsnIZktIc?si=l2_hUn4eezclP2sA" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Après avoir été growleuse dans un groupe de death, joué dans des comédies musicales, monté les marches à Cannes, crevé l’écran face au jury de The Voice, être à 2 doigts de représenter l’Allemagne à l’Eurovision ou encore brûlé les planches à Avignon, quoi de plus naturel que de prendre d’assaut la Mainstage 2? Karoline Rose, mi-ange, mi-démon et artiste ô combien multi-facettes, vient vous assurer un bon coup de soleil avec sa brutal pop, un mix improbable entre ABBA et Gojira. Ça va chauffer !

attributes.title: SUN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5EjzvshGaeIYnjdttJF6ZQ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bnHsnIZktIc?si=l2_hUn4eezclP2sA" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: SUN created a genre she calls “brutal pop”, a blend of mainstream pop and rock Metal. Catchy toplines, colourful visuals, feral screams and double pedal drums: her brutal pop could be the hidden child of St Vincent and Gojira. Her songs express the violence of great emotions: true love, joy, grief. SUN brings a message of hope, courage and love, as life is worth living even in the toughest moments

attributes.title: WITHIN TEMPTATION
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3hE8S8ohRErocpkY7uJW4a?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dBilK-h3lRQ?si=OD8yc1Ly8jIIwNhB" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Toujours plus haut, toujours plus fort ! Déjà maître du metal symphonique avec le Désir de Nuit finlandais, rien ne semble pouvoir contrarier l’irrésistible ascension de la bande à Sharon vers le firmament, tous genres confondus. Audace artistique et prise de positions sociétales et politiques font bon ménage et on ne peut que s’en réjouir. Un concert avec une production énorme et des tubes comme s’il en pleuvait : un moment-clé de l’édition.

attributes.title: WITHIN TEMPTATION
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3hE8S8ohRErocpkY7uJW4a?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dBilK-h3lRQ?si=OD8yc1Ly8jIIwNhB" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Always higher, always stronger! Already a master of symphonic metal alongside Finland’s Nightwish, nothing seems to be able to thwart the irresistible rise of Sharon's band towards the firmament, all genres combined. Artistic daring and taking societal and political positions is a great combination, isn’t it? A concert with enormous production and hits like it was raining: a key moment of the edition.

attributes.title: CACHEMIRE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4AJBNggqryKH5Dy0xdaGDY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ddxIbLBjsY8?si=8jcsUnFReWpWmaeq" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Il y a 10 ans, ces 4 garçons entraient dans le rock à coups de talons dans la porte, lançant par la même occasion un pavé dans la mare des puristes prouvant que celui-ci n’était pas l’apanage du phrasé anglais. Quelques albums au compteur et une confirmation qu’ils n’étaient pas qu’un fétu de paille. En force et en riffs, ils l’ouvrent, ils crient, ils hurlent et nous montrent qu’ils en ont sous le capot. CACHEMIRE, c’est du velours.

attributes.title: CACHEMIRE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4AJBNggqryKH5Dy0xdaGDY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ddxIbLBjsY8?si=8jcsUnFReWpWmaeq" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Why impose yourself to sing in English when you are able to demonstrate that you can offer twirling and unbridled rock n' roll while speaking in French? These four awesome guys have been at the top of the bill for 10 years and are doing it in the most beautiful way. It's solid, it's tough and that’s damn good!

attributes.title: LAST TRAIN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4S47feOS2ATuhc7Ao5ilfG?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CltmaxjO4E4?si=LtGA5zFHuDyQndH_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: « Meilleure chose qui soit arrivée au rock français depuis Noir Désir ». « Sensation rock hexagonale ». « Révélation live de l'année ». « Ils redorent le blason du rock tricolore ». « Un des meilleurs espoirs du rock français ». Que de compliments mérités à l’endroit du combo alsacien dont la notoriété grimpe crescendo et qui commence à prendre une sacrée place sur l’échiquier du rock hexagonal. Un futur (déjà) grand.

attributes.title: LAST TRAIN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4S47feOS2ATuhc7Ao5ilfG?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CltmaxjO4E4?si=LtGA5zFHuDyQndH_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: “Best thing to happen to French rock since Noir Désir”. “French rock sensation”. “Live band of the year". “One of the best hopes of French rock”. So many well-deserved compliments to this promising band whose notoriety is growing fast and is beginning to take up quite a place on the French rock scene. The future belongs to them.

attributes.title: MUSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/12Chz98pHFMPJEknJQMWvI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3dm_5qWWDV8?si=jrpq7RmBKS9K5-rx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: MUSE : 4 lettres qui résonnent comme un coup de tonnerre sur la programmation 2025 ! La venue du trio, véritable phénomène sur la planète rock, est un événement que même le roi Charles III doit nous envier. Depuis 30 ans, la formation originaire du comté de Devon, album après album, ne cesse de s’affirmer comme l'un des plus grands groupes de l’Empire britannique. Cette machine de guerre scénique vient embraser les plaines clissonnaises pour un moment riche en émotion et en décibels !

attributes.title: MUSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/12Chz98pHFMPJEknJQMWvI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3dm_5qWWDV8?si=jrpq7RmBKS9K5-rx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: MUSE: 4 letters that make a strong impression on the 2025 poster! This concert is a true event as the three-piece hailing from Devon has been one of the greatest groups in the British Empire for 30 years. MUSE will set the Mainstage ablaze and will definitely write one of the most beautiful pages of the festival’s History.

attributes.title: THE CULT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/49DW3KvkyjHO35mK1JnSyS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZCOSPtyZAPA?si=M9zk6Rc8nf72v-na" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Fort d’une carrière de 40 ans, d’albums et de hits intemporels figurant dans le Panthéon du Rock, le groupe de Ian Astbury et Bill Duffy est l’un des plus emblématiques et importants de son Histoire. C’est donc un privilège que d’accueillir cette légende à l’occasion de cette édition et une forme de soulagement après l’annulation de dernière minute de 2023. Rarement un groupe n’a aussi bien porté son nom que celui-ci.

attributes.title: THE CULT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/49DW3KvkyjHO35mK1JnSyS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZCOSPtyZAPA?si=M9zk6Rc8nf72v-na" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: With a career spanning 40 years with albums and timeless hits appearing in the Rock Pantheon, the band led by Ian Astbury and Bill Duffy is one of the most emblematic and important in its History. It is therefore a privilege to welcome this living legend and a form of relief after the last minute cancellation of 2023. Rarely has a group worn a name as well as this one.

attributes.title: THE HU
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0b2B3PwcYzQAhuJacmcYgc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2WrvFUZgHro?si=ga6RmjdIWoNC2iZX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le concert-évènement de 2023 de la horde mongole avait soumis à rude épreuve les structures de la Temple, dégueulant comme jamais de fans déjà convertis et de curieux venant juger sur pièce sa popularité naissante. Deux ans plus tard, l’octuor plante ses yourtes sur la MS1, territoire plus vaste et confortable pour y interpréter son metal exaltant et si personnel, mêlant chant traditionnel mongol et instruments folkloriques typiques du Pays du Ciel Bleu. Un grand moment de communion en perspective !

attributes.title: THE HU
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0b2B3PwcYzQAhuJacmcYgc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2WrvFUZgHro?si=ga6RmjdIWoNC2iZX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The concert event of 2023 was a horde of Mongols giving us a rude awakening at the Temple stage, unleashing sounds like you had never before heard and converting a swarm of curious fans to the ever-rising star of THE HU. Two years later, the octet has come to plant their yurts here once more, this time on the second main stage, a much larger and more comfortable territory if there ever was one! Prepare for them to unleash their brand of exultant and personal heavy metal from the Land of Blue Sky!

attributes.title: THE WARNING
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2SmW1lFlBJn4IfBzBZDlSh?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/j13uxB6fDvk?si=5BJglBr8LHQPXhZZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les sœurs Villareal sont encore toutes jeunes mais comptent déjà 10 ans de circuit et 4 albums pleins d’énergie et de maîtrise, qui leurs ont permis une ascension fulgurante. De quoi être adoubées par les plus grands (Metallica, Foo Fighters ou Muse qui les a embarquées en 1ère partie de sa dernière tournée). Un rock galvanisant et inspiré pour ce trio sororal. De là à prendre la place des vieux monstres sacrés, il n’y a qu’un pas... que l’on les invite à franchir.

attributes.title: THE WARNING

attributes.content: The Villareal sisters are still very young ladies but they already have quite an experience with 10 years of career and 4 albums under the belt full of energy and mastery. Hence a meteoric rise and the interest shown by the biggest (Metallica, Foo Fighters or Muse who took them on as support of their last tour). Galvanizing and inspired rock: the future belongs to them!

attributes.title: VOWWS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7pBR5RoBlOm3oehKuFCxeb?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Pour ce duo australien basé à Los Angeles, new-wave, post-punk et synth-pop ne sont qu’une seule et unique entité qu’ils nomment eux-mêmes death-pop. Empruntant la face la plus sombre de ces styles, ils exposent au grand jour leurs émotions mélancoliques, tour à tour sans espoir puis réjouissantes. Synthétique et angoissant, VOWWS tend un miroir amusant à un monde fracturé et nous montre toute la beauté cachée dans les fissures.

attributes.title: VOWWS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7pBR5RoBlOm3oehKuFCxeb?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lu9NzLOc9Wg?si=3m5bd62w41xvrAdx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: VOWWS are an Australian multi-disciplinary duo, based in Los Angeles. They have been described as 'death pop’ - existential angst and longing, feeding on a diet of popular culture, cinema and advertising, nostalgia for something that never happened. They exist at an intersection of hidden emotions - melancholic but not sad, reflective but not hopeful, and fun without being the slightest bit aware of it.

attributes.title: ROYAL REPUBLIC
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dhcGNN9r1D4?si=-cXwoiBB6sALdbUx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

attributes.content: Les 4 Suédois déjantés ne sont pas un groupe de rock ordinaire, n’adhérant ni aux clichés ni aux diktats du rock’n’roll. Est-ce bien ou mal ? Balek, ROYAL REPUBLIC a toujours raison ! Et son rock est là pour en témoigner. Pur concentré de groove et de rythmes entraînants à souhaits, de quoi titiller votre cortex et inciter votre petit cul à une irrésistible envie de se trémousser. Il est grand temps de lever vos putain de mains en l’air et de danser !

attributes.title: ROYAL REPUBLIC
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dhcGNN9r1D4?si=-cXwoiBB6sALdbUx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

attributes.content: ROYAL REPUBLIC is not your average rock band. They don’t buy into the clichés or the dos and don’ts of rock n’roll. A purist might shake their head and say “Hey now, this isn’t right!” but they’d be wrong. ROYAL REPUBLIC is always right! It’s the weird flavour combination that doesn’t make sense until you try it. It’s time to put your fucking hands up and dance!

attributes.content: Si l’impayable gaillard continue de perpétuer son art en tant qu’artiste solo, personne n’a oublié l’implication d’ABBATH dans la genèse et l’établissement d’IMMORTAL au sommet des plus hautes sphères du black metal. Et c’est avec délectation que nous observons se profiler ce concert qui s’annonce forcément dantesque, où le bonhomme interprétera les œuvres les plus marquantes du mythique combo norvégien, dix ans après son départ fracassant. Un moment d’exception, c’est certain.

attributes.title: Abbath "Doom Occulta"
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1epGwdbjU7JSGVBHlqptpx?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: This priceless guy continues his career as a solo artist, but no one has forgotten ABBATH's involvement in the genesis and establishment of IMMORTAL at the top of the highest echelons of black metal. It is with delight that we watch this concert take shape as the man will perform the most striking works of the legendary Norwegian combo, ten years after his shattering departure. An exceptional moment, that’s for sure.

attributes.title: ADX
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5f6R1KDAOj3CniEwvEoCFl?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Impeccable fer de lance de la scène heavy/speed metal tricolore depuis plus de 4 décennies, ADX prêche les vices et vertus du style avec les arguments aussi solides qu’inimitables qui lui ont permis de bâtir sa légende. Riffs robustes et féroces, rythmiques échevelées, solos virtuoses, envolées vocales dans la langue de Molière de l’inimitable Phil : des armes de destruction massive dont la vaillante division blindée use et abuse pour le bonheur de tous.

attributes.title: ADX
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5f6R1KDAOj3CniEwvEoCFl?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Impeccable spearheads of the French heavy/speed metal scene for over four decades, ADX have championed the virtues and vices of the genre with a formidable arsenal that has cemented their legendary status. Fierce riffs, frenetic pacing, inspired solos, Phil’s powerful vocals, and French lyrics: these weapons of mass destruction are wielded masterfully by this valiant armored division for the delight of all.

attributes.title: AGRICULTURE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/23Skjj6LyKEVkNIUFrLBUY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Le black metal explore généralement les aspects les plus sombres de l’existence. Pourtant, chez ce jeune combo de Los Angeles, nouvelle sensation de la scène extrême, les rythmes explosifs et les hurlements évoquent une profondeur joyeuse, un moment d’extase. Ils subliment la beauté de ce monde et vous noient sous une tornade d’émotions avec leur black extatique. La recherche par le son d’une profonde communion avec la nature.

attributes.title: AGRICULTURE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/23Skjj6LyKEVkNIUFrLBUY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Black metal often delves into the darkest corners of existence. This young Los Angeles-based combo has become a rising sensation in the extreme scene, carving out its own path with explosive rhythms and piercing howls. Drawing inspiration from oceanic themes, they elevate the beauty of the natural world while pulling you into a swirling vortex of emotion and euphoric blackness.

attributes.title: LEPROUS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4lgrzShsg2FLA89UM2fdO5?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: De leurs nombreuses années de backing band live d’Ihsahn, les Norvégiens ont conservé un esprit avant-gardiste intact. Passés maîtres dans l’art du contre-pied, animés par une soif d’expérimentation insatiable, ils ne cessent d’expérimenter, alternant déflagrations sonores et mélodies à la lisière de la pop, sans jamais rien perdre de leurs racines extrêmes. Il serait regrettable de ne pas profiter de leur metal progressif hautement raffiné.

attributes.title: LEPROUS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4lgrzShsg2FLA89UM2fdO5?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fAFPje41KtY?si=JvLiY5-CT4lSLMJK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: LEPROUS is a talented five-piece progressive metal band hailing from Norway and whose music is not an easy one to classify. Various genres are included, from progressive rock, to jazz, to pure metal. The vocals alternate between clean and growling, something which gives the music a heaviness it otherwise wouldn't have. An interesting listening-experience for the open-minded music fan.

attributes.title: PERSEFONE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4wxyib7wQwVxwKNFBmOhAw?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Ah ! Andorre et ses produits détaxés en tout genre, dont sont friands bon nombre de nos compatriotes. Mais on vous propose plutôt de franchir la petite frontière pour y découvrir un des combos les plus excitants de la scène progressive. Ces 6 virtuoses explorent sans cesse toutes les voies du metal et font de leur musique sophistiquée un voyage intérieur, à la découverte de soi. Un dévouement total à leur art, aussi excitant que spirituel.

attributes.title: PERSEFONE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4wxyib7wQwVxwKNFBmOhAw?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: PERSEFONE, hailing from the enchanting principality of Andorra, is a visionary band that has carved its own niche in the global music scene. Formed in the year 2001, their unique fusion of progressive and melodic elements has earned them a very dedicated following. Known for their mesmerizing live performances, PERSEFONE has graced stages worldwide, leaving audiences spellbound.

attributes.title: SYK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4mAhDco0hekGonexJ7ZdNG?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Puissant et sinueux, le death progressif des Italiens s'affranchit des genres pour créer à sa guise et vous emmener dans un monde tortueux et complexe. En perpétuelle innovation, SYK ne cesse de flirter avec les frontières de la scène extrême, remettant en question les perceptions et repoussant les limites de l'expression musicale. Une maîtrise technique irréprochable pour un chaos terriblement attirant.

attributes.title: SYK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4mAhDco0hekGonexJ7ZdNG?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Crafting a sonic universe that defies traditional conventions, SYK transcends mere genre labels, forging a path that is distinctly their own. The Italian collective, known for its intricate compositions and relentless innovation, stands at the frontier of the extreme metal scene, challenging perceptions and pushing the limits of musical expression.

attributes.title: THE OCEAN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6fuALtryzj4cq7vkglKLxq?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Fondé à l'aube du présent millénaire, THE OCEAN ne montre aujourd'hui aucun signe d’essoufflement aspirationnel, bien au contraire. Réunis autour d'une vision commune d'exploration sonore sans limites et d'une lourdeur implacable, les membres du collectif berlinois ont acquis une réputation formidable au sein des scènes post-rock, post-metal, metal progressif et hardcore (entre autres !). Une intégrité artistique incorruptible au service d’une œuvre implacable.

attributes.title: THE OCEAN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6fuALtryzj4cq7vkglKLxq?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: The Berlin-based atmospheric post metal juggernaut THE OCEAN was founded at the dawn of the millennium and today shows no sign of slowing down even with over 20 years, under their belt. Coming together around a shared vision of limitless sonic exploration and unrelenting heaviness, they gained a formidable reputation within the post rock, post metal, progressive metal & hardcore scenes.

attributes.title: URNE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1daJkdlSgLE2kmnNUjmRpU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: L‘appel de la fanbase de plus en plus conséquente du trio britannique a enfin été entendu par votre festival préféré. Et il semble qu’elle ne soit pas seule à avoir décelé son talent, puisqu’un certain Joe Duplantier (Gojira) l’a pris sous son aile en produisant son dernier album. Écorché, élégant, doux et brutal à la fois, le metal à tendance progressive de URNE ravira aussi bien les amateurs de technicité que les âmes sensibles.

attributes.title: URNE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1daJkdlSgLE2kmnNUjmRpU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Mi1S_ulqe-o?si=ReoCvR42Vx8ySzHt" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The call of the British trio's growing fanbase has finally been heard by your favourite festival. The guys in URNE showcase a level of synergy that is truly rare and a level of promise that is equally rare. Elegant, soft and brutal at the same time, URNE's progressive metal will delight both fans of technicality and sensitive souls.

attributes.title: VESTIGE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0EK0zScYBi3NbAs66JRwJN?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Voilà un récit musical qui regorge de sons profonds et de silences murmurés. Un metal moderne, atmosphérique et progressif, aux contours shoegaze, qui vous transporte dans des paysages mélodiques intenses et des moments tourmentés et poignants. VESTIGE juxtapose l'agonie du désespoir avec la beauté sublime de l'espoir. Un voyage auditif brut, poignant, exaltant et tortueux qui vous frappe en plein cœur. Émotions garanties !

attributes.title: VESTIGE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0EK0zScYBi3NbAs66JRwJN?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Emerging as a creative vessel for a complicated emotional journey, VESTIGE transcend the boundaries of individual therapy into a collaborative force that hopefully resonates with the feelings that are all too common for so many. With a profound connection to their craft, they pour their souls into their work, infusing it with a captivating blend of melancholy, desperation, and catharsis. The music serves not only as an expression of their turmoil, but as a conduit for listeners to navigate the complexities of their own emotions.

attributes.title: VOLA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1HQjBwlj8FSHMhVaNQ4tEI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n-5xyCwH0mk?si=0nPy1HSKCRJNmkBm" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le quatuor danois n’en finit plus d’élargir son approche innovante du metal progressif et continue de captiver le public avec son mélange de complexité rythmique intense et de récits lyriques poignants. Il transcende toujours les frontières des genres, offrant une musique aussi stimulante intellectuellement qu’émotionnellement résonnante. Pop, metal, électro, VOLA explore et s’impose de façon singulière comme un petit bijou de metal moderne.

attributes.title: VOLA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1HQjBwlj8FSHMhVaNQ4tEI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n-5xyCwH0mk?si=0nPy1HSKCRJNmkBm" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Known for their innovative approach to progressive metal, VOLA continues to captivate audiences with their blend of intense rhythmic complexity and poignant lyrical narratives. The band has always transcended genre boundaries, delivering music as intellectually stimulating as it is emotionally resonant. But with this perpetual evolution, the pressure doesn't consume them.

attributes.title: VULTURE INDUSTRIES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2ZkCq3NiRMh8QkAWzQWXnp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FB4d8lMEeLg?si=D4D1OYwfTJqbEzC1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Si Bergen est d’emblée affilié à la scène black metal, ce serait faire injure aux autres combos de la cité côtière norvégienne qui tentent avec panache de se défaire de cette étiquette. Parmi les grands vainqueurs de cette quête, les gars de VULTURE INDUSTRIES explorent avec brio des horizons plus expérimentaux. Leur mix de metal progressif et de post-punk a tout de la bande-son d’un cabaret gothique décadent et déjanté.

attributes.title: VULTURE INDUSTRIES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2ZkCq3NiRMh8QkAWzQWXnp?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FB4d8lMEeLg?si=D4D1OYwfTJqbEzC1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: If Bergen immediately rhymes with black metal, there are talented groups who stand out with talent in a very different genre. Among the main bands to be reckoned with, the wacky guys from VULTURE INDUSTRIES brilliantly explore experimental horizons. Their progressive metal/post-punk mix is the soundtrack of a decadent and crazy gothic cabaret.

attributes.title: BLOOD FIRE DEATH (A TRIBUTE TO BATHORY)
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/2QVt9UZEloRJgYqE70ACPs?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_ghJQzNDihA?si=7YvCeWThWA5SId8v" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Thomas « Quorthon » Forsberg. Un nom qui résonne comme une légende. Celle de Bathory, sans qui le black metal, tel que nous le connaissons, n'aurait jamais été le même. Inventeur du viking metal, disparu trop tôt, il mérite un hommage sous la bannière de BLOOD, FIRE, DEATH. Un set mené de mains de maître par d'anciens membres de Bathory accompagnés de musiciens non moins reconnus de la scène extrême. Mettez vos casques, remplissez vos cornes et préparez-vous au combat !

attributes.title: BLOOD FIRE DEATH (A TRIBUTE TO BATHORY)
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/2QVt9UZEloRJgYqE70ACPs?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_ghJQzNDihA?si=7YvCeWThWA5SId8v" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: BATHORY - Icons of black metal, pioneers of viking metal! Hardly any other band has influenced the metal scene as significantly as this one-man project of Thomas "Quorthon" Forsberg, who unfortunately passed away too early in 2004. Without performing live even once he managed to create two styles of music. The guys of BLOOD FIRE DEATH pay tribute to Quorthon’s legacy and the music of Bathory.with a main focus on Bathory's viking era. Put your helmets on, fill your drinking horns and get ready for battle!

attributes.title: DEAFHEAVEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4XpPveeg7RuYS3CgLo75t9?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fXTBQQU191Y?si=HeKgZGtf4wtQxGAA" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le quintet originaire de San Francisco a longtemps eu une relation tourmentée avec la scène metal. Pas assez black pour les trves et trop extrême pour les amateurs de shoegaze. Mais il n’a que faire des codes des uns et des autres, préférant la transgression totale et le mélange des émotions. Une collision brillante de beauté, de violence et de désespoir qui ne laisse aucune chance à chacune des 2 parties. Audacieux et classieux !

attributes.title: DEAFHEAVEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4XpPveeg7RuYS3CgLo75t9?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fXTBQQU191Y?si=HeKgZGtf4wtQxGAA" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The San Franciscans have had a tormented relationship with the metal scene for quite a while. Not black enough for die-hard fans and too extreme for shoegaze ones. They ignore codes and prefer total transgression and the mixture of emotions. A brilliant collision of beauty, violence and despair that leaves neither side with a chance. Bold and classy!

attributes.title: GRIMA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7KSPZyeCKkfkhMkX8rYIhD?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gPHZfCpvSD4?si=pQE8MpA9WfCdUT0D" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le projet sorti tout droit du ciboulot des frangins Sysoev (Max et Gleb à la ville, Morbium et Vilhelm sous le maquillage) a pris de l’ampleur, ce que sa présence à l’affiche démontre. Les atmosphères déployées par la horde sibérienne, tout aussi lugubres qu’épiques et vivifiantes témoignent d'un savoir-faire bluffant et disposent de toutes les qualités pour ravir les adeptes du genre que les amateurs d’envolées aériennes.

attributes.title: GRIMA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7KSPZyeCKkfkhMkX8rYIhD?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gPHZfCpvSD4?si=pQE8MpA9WfCdUT0D" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Started in 2014 as a studio-only endeavour by two twins (Vilhelm and Morbius) from Siberia, GRIMA has gradually become a four-piece band, active both live and in studio. The atmospheres are equally gloomy, epic and invigorating and demonstrate astonishing know-how and have all the qualities to delight fans of the genre. And more.

attributes.title: LUNAR TOMBFIELDS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/13ps3JD0yQrCWnhcwBLOr3?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/i_CKEHKMX5k?si=lyOvIPHtfUH4ZnaC" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Tout jeune projet nantais, le duo LUNAR TOMBFIELDS met fortement l'accent sur l'ambiance, la mélodie et la contemplation dans son black metal bouleversant d’authenticité et de mélancolie. Une ode à la gloire des étoiles, à la force des éléments et à la tragédie du destin humain. Une œuvre sincère et passionnée dont se dégage une beauté poignante mais funeste. Le soleil a définitivement trouvé sa place au cœur de la tempête.

attributes.title: LUNAR TOMBFIELDS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/13ps3JD0yQrCWnhcwBLOr3?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/i_CKEHKMX5k?si=lyOvIPHtfUH4ZnaC" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Nantes-based duo LUNAR TOMBFIELDS places a strong emphasis on atmosphere, melody and contemplation with overwhelmingly authentic and melancholic black metal. An ode to the glory of the stars, the strength of the elements and the tragedy of human destiny. A sincere and passionate work. A poignant but disastrous beauty emerges. The sun has definitely found its place in the heart of the storm.

attributes.title: SPECTRAL WOUND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3i6zP2x9GMBV3WyRzqQtM6?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SLrLtrrZM68?si=ALyxtEGfgf7im0SZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Aussi glacial que le grand froid québécois, le black metal chirurgical et radical des Montréalais de SPECTRAL WOUND se veut à la fois mélancolique et virulent. Exit le mysticisme et les croyances souvent associées au style. Cette musique furieuse s’adresse à tous les profanes, les futiles et les débauchés de ce bas monde. Sauvage et crust dans l’esprit, le quintet vient faire résonner ses riffs vicieux et majestueux !

attributes.title: SPECTRAL WOUND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3i6zP2x9GMBV3WyRzqQtM6?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SLrLtrrZM68?si=ALyxtEGfgf7im0SZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The surgical and radical black metal of Montrealers SPECTRAL WOUND is both melancholic  and virulent. Here, no mysticism and beliefs often associated with the style. This furious music is aimed at all the profane, the futile and underdogs of this world. Wild and crusty, the quintet comes to resonate their vicious and majestic riffs!

attributes.title: TRYGLAV
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6Va71hx7PWi5TeBU4iPB0l?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mN-2BOSED1w?si=yDJwsyvnAtvkL5Vs" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Créature du multi-instrumentiste croate Boris Behara, TRYGLAV s’impose déjà comme une solide référence sur l’échiquier du black metal mélodique malgré seulement deux opus dans les bacs. Friande de chevauchées épiques et d’atmosphères sinistres, elle perpétue avec application et inspiration une certaine idée de l’école suédoise en la matière. Un périple tout aussi funeste qu’inspirant. Embarquement sous les tentures de la Temple.

attributes.title: TRYGLAV
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6Va71hx7PWi5TeBU4iPB0l?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mN-2BOSED1w?si=yDJwsyvnAtvkL5Vs" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The brainchild of multi instrumentalist Boris Behara, TRYGLAVE has rapidly entered the pantheon of some of the best modern melodic black metal, despite only having two albums out. Masters of epic battle anthems and sinister atmospheres, they have brought a certain Swedish sound to the material. With a sound that is funereal as it is inspiring, prepare to embark across the River Styx under the Temple!

attributes.title: WITCH CLUB SATAN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/395rqoVSDgQIF7fzRfZIoy?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/__H6LvwmZ4M?si=7jJSSneYrNaomWHR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le nom du groupe pourrait en abuser certains et laisser penser à un combo mêlant esthétique sataniste et ambiances de dance-floor… La case est clairement plus que cochée pour le volet visuel. Pour ce qui est de la musique, c’est bien un pacte de sang et de furie qui a été signé avec le Malin par trois sorcières déchaînées. Du black metal venimeux, déchirant et haineux à la sauvagerie intense qui fait trembler les coucougnettes !

attributes.title: WITCH CLUB SATAN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/395rqoVSDgQIF7fzRfZIoy?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/__H6LvwmZ4M?si=7jJSSneYrNaomWHR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: A maelstrom of blackened artistry, this Norwegian trio reverberates with the icepick ferocity of classic Norwegian black metal while infusing it with a fresh, rebellious spirit. WITCH CLUB SATAN haven’t merely entered the black metal arena, they’ve stormed it, brandishing a banner of innovation and audacity.

attributes.title: CONAN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/11tiA94VlUZOUTVCdQYw3a?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-TFwio0Uk28?si=_ZRZEcI3WB2Kz9tB" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Ode funeste à la puissance et à la lenteur, le doom écrasant de ces trois garçons de Liverpool, pas vraiment dans le vent, dispose de bien des atouts pour réjouir ceux dont les vitesses de pointe gastéropodiques, les riffs pachydermiques et les ambiances charbonneuses flattent les bourses. Chants habités et incantatoires, mélodies lancinantes, rythmiques plombées : ces trois lascars encapuchonnés ont une conception très personnelle de l’adjectif "festif".

attributes.title: CONAN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/11tiA94VlUZOUTVCdQYw3a?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-TFwio0Uk28?si=_ZRZEcI3WB2Kz9tB" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: A disastrous ode to power and slowness, the crushing doom metal of these Scousers has many assets to delight those who are greedy for slow speed, mammoth-like riffs and dark and heavy atmospheres. Inhabited incantatory songs, haunting melodies, leaden rhythms: these three hooded lads have a very personal conception of what “fun” is.

attributes.title: HAVE A NICE LIFE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0FRKTwQSToXpCxYMhyUzYY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8QmPCrC7uXw?si=y1vqcXHO5yp30tS3" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Vous qui entrez ici, abandonnez toute espérance. Étant donné la teneur hautement mélancolique de la musique proposée par le combo du Connecticut, c’est la meilleure chose que vous puissiez faire. Véritables odes à la tristesse, à la noirceur et au mal-être, ses compositions à la beauté funeste vous plongent dans un état semi-dépressif. Avec HAVE A NICE LIFE, il va d’abord falloir en passer par la mort pour jouir des plaisirs de la vie.

attributes.title: HAVE A NICE LIFE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0FRKTwQSToXpCxYMhyUzYY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
