attributes.content: The Connecticut combo offers a work with a highly melancholy content that leads one to abandon all hope. Their songs are true odes to sadness. The darkness and unease expressed plunge you into a semi-depressive state. With HAVE A NICE LIFE, you will first have to go through death to enjoy the pleasures of life.

attributes.title: HOWARD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3bwdCcoC0DQB3fpQn9fqnm?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jbgtn2cy9Z0?si=0d1TpjdvVqb-ROYh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: HOWARD envoie un rock rempli d’orgue Hammond, de fuzz et d’éléments électroniques ayant traversé les décennies. L’ombre des plus grands plane sur le trio parisien, de Led Zeppelin à All Them Witches en passant par les Doors ou Kadavar. Il propose un trip vintage au groove constant, aux envolées fuzz bien senties et avec un feeling affolant. Un anachronisme sonore qui prend la forme d’un ouragan rock confinant à la transe.

attributes.title: HOWARD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3bwdCcoC0DQB3fpQn9fqnm?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jbgtn2cy9Z0?si=0d1TpjdvVqb-ROYh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: HOWARD displays some fine rock music filled with Hammond organ, fuzz and electronic elements. The shadow of the greatest hangs over the Parisian trio, from Led Zeppelin to All Them Witches via the Doors or Kadavar. This is a vintage trip with constant groove, well-felt fuzz flights and a maddening feeling. A sonic anachronism which takes the form of a rock hurricane!

attributes.title: MARS RED SKY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1vrCjYU0zXNXvLobueUTvQ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S2GWD-odjo4?si=QENMU5gOKA3cQ56W" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Depuis son dernier passage plébiscité de 2017, le trio a pris de l’ampleur en termes de notoriété, passant du statut d’espoir en devenir (avec toutefois quelques belles réalisations dans son carcan) à celui de valeur confirmée au sein de la scène rock psyché domestique et même au-delà. Véritable invitation à des pérégrinations cosmiques échevelées et planantes, la mélopée des Bordelais prend tout son sens et sa noblesse en conditions live. Des déjà très grands !

attributes.title: MARS RED SKY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1vrCjYU0zXNXvLobueUTvQ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S2GWD-odjo4?si=QENMU5gOKA3cQ56W" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Since their last arrival on stage in 2017, the trio has reached a new pinnacle of notoriety, going from the hope of a new generation, with all of their gorgeous improvisations and vibes into a titan of the psych rock scene both in France and abroad. To see them come back will be to take a journey to the stars, these Bordeaux masters of the riff will bring their noble performance to a whole new level at Hellfest.

attributes.title: MY SLEEPING KARMA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4idYdwYKM9exGep2RkwHcE?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XONnmccKhPI?si=1ohIDLEnrax7AqIx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Difficile de se remettre de la perte d’un proche. Malgré la disparition tragique de leur batteur en 2023, les Allemands semblent prendre leur musique comme exutoire. Ils remontent sur les planches avec leurs compositions aussi hypnotiques que transcendantes. Une succession de mélodies enivrantes et aériennes confère à leurs shows une incroyable sensation de paix intérieure. Un moment mystique vous attend, venez retrouver votre paix intérieure.

attributes.title: MY SLEEPING KARMA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4idYdwYKM9exGep2RkwHcE?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XONnmccKhPI?si=1ohIDLEnrax7AqIx" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Formed almost 20 years ago as a strong bond of best friends, the band is today one of the most well-respected instrumental post- and hypnotic rock bands within the heavy music community. Sickness, death, and existential fear had brought the band to a point in music and life at which they were close to parting ways. But their will to survive was stronger and their music has become their outlet.

attributes.title: STONED JESUS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/23lyMLxYNPS15hpVvFNptR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/63NdYQngxgs?si=us5OnPSormuYTpEd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les heures semblent toujours aussi sombres sur les bords du Dniepr. Mais le power trio parvient pourtant à sortir la tête hors de l’eau. Délaissant les affres de la guerre, il vient vous abreuver de riffs gras et bien lourds, façon T-64 roulant sur le Kremlin. Les envolées psychédéliques couplées à une lenteur écrasante vous transporteront loin de ce tumulte guerrier. Entre stoner, blues, rock et doom metal. Cru, sale, saturé, fuzzy, heavy !

attributes.title: STONED JESUS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/23lyMLxYNPS15hpVvFNptR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/63NdYQngxgs?si=us5OnPSormuYTpEd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Melting faces since 2009 – STONED JESUS wouldn`t dare to show up at your party without a solid slab of stoner rock! But make no mistake with this Ukrainian trio: this is not your average desert session! The band’s music is a rather multi-faceted affair mixing groove with noise rock elements and lots of proggy infusions. Giants such as Mastodon and Melvins come to mind since STONED JESUS can`t be pigeonholed.

attributes.title: THE MIDNIGHT GHOST TRAIN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/00M3GIVU6II422esTIrRyV?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/njsHUl0axnc?si=3QvYI1X4wIRm2IRr" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: La dernière et unique entrée en gare du Hellfest du Train Fantôme de Minuit (10 ans déjà !) est restée dans les mémoires des festivaliers qui avaient eu le privilège de prendre l’apéro sous la Valley en se délectant de son gouleyant set. Groupe de scène par essence, le power-trio US magnifie les planches de son stoner délicieusement heavy et frelaté aux effluves blues-rock et aux vapeurs sudistes. Un must incontournable tant le groupe propose un nombre très réduit de concerts ces dernières années.

attributes.title: THE MIDNIGHT GHOST TRAIN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/00M3GIVU6II422esTIrRyV?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/njsHUl0axnc?si=3QvYI1X4wIRm2IRr" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The band’s last performance at Hellfest was 10 years ago and has stayed firm in the memories of festival goers who had the privilege to see their show under the Valley for a high powered and fun set. A band who live and die by the scene, this American power trio brings forth a brand of heavy stoner rock sorcery that is deliciously flavoured with blues and southern rock flavours. There is something undeniable about this band, made all the more special as their shows have become all the more rare in recent years.

attributes.title: WINDHAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6wE3e84Zg41JF04Z39i5wv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CYxxzw37wWw?si=iEf-z4irJ5pzdkcU" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le quatuor virginien a beau donner dans la musique lourde et caverneuse, il n’a pas son pareil pour vous transporter vers les cieux. Porté par la voix cotonneuse et envoûtante de Dorthia Cottrell, il élève son doom vers une dimension psychédélique. Baignant dans le mysticisme, WINDHAND illumine et éclabousse de son aura le parterre d’auditeurs que vous êtes. Les 2 pieds plombés au sol mais la tête dans les étoiles.

attributes.title: WINDHAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6wE3e84Zg41JF04Z39i5wv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CYxxzw37wWw?si=iEf-z4irJ5pzdkcU" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The work of the Virginian quartet is heavy and cavernous but is just as light and luminous. Dorthia Cottrell's captivating voice gives the Richmond band's doom metal a psychedelic dimension. Bathed in mysticism, WINDHAND illuminates the listeners, both feet on the ground but heads in the stars.

attributes.title: DEFEATER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1L3hqVCHSL1Ajy3m0z1bAT?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gD-rffbriWI?si=j-YwN_P4CtQ317_s" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Groupe référentiel de la scène hardcore mélodique, DEFEATER n'a jamais eu peur de passer au niveau supérieur avec un concept-album séminal qui s'est développé en de nombreuses sorties complémentaires, chacune s'appuyant sur les fondations de l'autre pour transcender le genre et le sujet, tout en se connectant avec les fans du monde entier. Percutante et émotionnelle, constamment à fleur de peau, l’œuvre du groupe est d’une intensité inouïe.

attributes.title: DEFEATER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1L3hqVCHSL1Ajy3m0z1bAT?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gD-rffbriWI?si=j-YwN_P4CtQ317_s" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Massachusetts melodic hardcore band DEFEATER has never been afraid to take it to the next level with an initial concept hardcore album that has grown into many studio releases, each building on the foundation of the other to transcend genre and subject matter, connecting with fans all over the world. DEFEATER’s work is pummeling as it is atmospheric, showcasing a band continually rediscovering itself and still hungry.

attributes.title: LAST HOUNDS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/61yrtlfW7trRIP8H3i9gr7?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yTMEvSoru6U?si=Agdyxk6bWjSLNzRD" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: « Nous sommes un groupe punk de à couper le souffle, avec beaucoup de choses à dire sur la merde qui nous entoure ». Voilà qui plante le décor ! Les Anglais viennent balancer leur énergie débordante au son d’un punk puisant son caractère dans bon nombre d’influences, hardcore, hip-hop, grunge ou encore nu-metal. Après avoir enflammé la Hell Stage l’an passé, ils reviennent pour tout casser à nouveau, mais dans la cour des grands cette fois.

attributes.title: LAST HOUNDS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/61yrtlfW7trRIP8H3i9gr7?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yTMEvSoru6U?si=Agdyxk6bWjSLNzRD" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: LAST HOUNDS are a Midlands, UK-based hardcore band, that meld influences combining the fearless energy of the likes of Gallows and Comeback Kid, the ear worm style song writing of Letlive. with the swagger of Frank Carter and The Rattlesnakes. After setting the Hell Stage on fire last year, it is time to do it gain but with the big boys this time. On the Warzone.

attributes.title: NASTY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7GnX7pGXdWtLObs16B1mFB?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/e5KB2Jzo1cw?si=ytkLFfdcYVCjw3B5" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Chers festivaliers, vous êtes priés de laisser votre cerveau au vestiaire le temps du concours de moulinets organisé par nos 4 voisins Belges. En revanche, tenue correcte exigée : t’as pas de protège-dents, tu rentres pas. Pour la suite, on laisse libre cours à votre corps pour nous proposer vos plus belles figures et vos plus beaux déhanchés. Amusez-vous, le pit est à vous. Amour, bienveillance et grosse patate dans la gueule !

attributes.title: NASTY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7GnX7pGXdWtLObs16B1mFB?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/e5KB2Jzo1cw?si=ytkLFfdcYVCjw3B5" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: An essential figurehead of the European beatdown hardore scene for ages, our Belgian neighbours have lost none of their splendour. The music is still devastating and generates monumental moshpits. Come on, let's leave our brains at the campsite and come and snort on the lawn and cobblestones of the Warzone for a moment of gruff tenderness!

attributes.title: PEST CONTROL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/06NrwSBss5Imv1Se0Hlv5Y?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PSFgC2q5K9w?si=b0FXeB3c8U6K_ft1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: L’essaim britannique est prêt à coloniser la planète avec un bon gros crossover thrash des familles, comme la nouvelle génération bien vénère sait le faire. PEST CONTROL vient dynamiter tout ce qui bouge avec sa fougue explosive et son usine à riffs dévastateurs. Une kyrielle de titres torchés aussi vite qu’un cul de mioche ou que le 1er ballon de rouge de Gégé de bon matin au PMU. Ça va vite, ça va fort, et ça fait du bien par où ça passe !

attributes.title: PEST CONTROL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/06NrwSBss5Imv1Se0Hlv5Y?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PSFgC2q5K9w?si=b0FXeB3c8U6K_ft1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: This young British gang hailing from Leeds aims to colonize the planet with the fast and jerky rhythm of crossover thrash hymns. PEST CONTROL dynamite the stage and the ears with their explosive energy and their devastating riffs. It’s fast, it’s hard, and it feels good, damn it!

attributes.title: SPY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7vCI1d19vrokQuRkiAhwMC?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/o2YuCSf5x14?si=XAT-sQvv2sB0czut" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Avant même le début du set, il est évident que SPY l’emportera par KO dès la première reprise. Si vous ne nous croyez pas, venez donc vous faire martyriser en Warzone et prendre quelques bons coups dans la mâchoire. Pas sûr que vos dents apprécient mais s’il faut en arriver là pour vous faire comprendre que ce groupe bute, alors nous sommes prêts à voir cette bande d’enragés, débordant de fureur, vous mettre en pièces !

attributes.title: SPY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7vCI1d19vrokQuRkiAhwMC?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: The situation is clear: SPY will win by KO in the first round, that's for sure! If you don't believe us, come and take a beating in front of the Warzone. Powerful and punishing, the music of these madmen overflows with fury. Despite everything, it’s impossible not to take pleasure in being mistreated like this!

attributes.title: STICK TO YOUR GUNS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2sqrupqcoipb7UzVKApEnJ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Véritable métronome de la performance, STICK TO YOUR GUNS (STYG pour les intimes et autres aficionados) ne laisse place à aucune surprise : ce groupe ne déçoit jamais dès qu’il monte sur scène. Son punk rock rentre-dedans mais mélodique se veut fédérateur et aux accointances métalliques sans dénaturer son propos. Sans se voir tagué du label "metalcore" honnis par beaucoup, tout en rassemblant un public punk, hardcore ou metal. Un petit exploit en quelque sorte !

attributes.title: STICK TO YOUR GUNS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2sqrupqcoipb7UzVKApEnJ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8WpyhuflHvs?si=JQAXUUF8p_PBHDhS" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: A true metronome of performance, STICK TO YOUR GUNS (STYG for friends and other aficionados) never disappoint when they hit the stage. They deliver in-your-face but melodic punk rock with a slight metal take on it without distorting its real core. And without being tagged with the “metalcore” label hated by many, while still bringing together punk, hardcore or metal kids. A truly great band.

attributes.title: TERROR
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1GVRgPtEC6sZFqvItIk3eg?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gnx6ZusJbE4?si=cR9zMQZ0EB1dFihG" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Au sommet de son art depuis plus de deux décennies de travail impeccable, la machine à tabasser TERROR incarne sans nul doute le plus beau fleuron de la scène hardcore de la côte ouest. D’une efficacité scénique sans faille, Scott Vogel et son gang sont une assurance tous risques contre la médiocrité et la suffisance à grand renfort d’hymnes fédérateurs et de riffs bodybuildés qui comblent autant les vieux thrashers que les jeunes coreux. Et les jeunes thrashers et les vieux coreux !

attributes.title: TERROR
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1GVRgPtEC6sZFqvItIk3eg?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gnx6ZusJbE4?si=cR9zMQZ0EB1dFihG" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: At the top of their game for over two decades of fine work, TERROR undoubtedly embody the finest flagship of the West Coast hardcore scene. With flawless stage efficiency, Scott Vogel and his gang are an all-risk insurance against mediocrity and complacency with unifying anthems and blistering riffs. Friendly violent fun!

attributes.title: THE CHISEL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/20jscDXkBqf0euv7zSsyTx?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RaXu_5PWxFc?si=oBzGjocxjeyRUt8_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Dans le cadre de l’accomplissement de son cursus d’apprentissage, l’élève THE CHISEL n’a pas choisi l’option « pisse, nihilisme et rat crevé », fonds de commerce de bien d’autres de ses camarades de classe keupons. Si le tronc commun reprend les poncifs affiliés au genre (vélocité, hargne et vocabulaire fleuri), ce combo british bon teint s’épanouit dans son parcours à travers une musique diablement sautillante et mélodique par moments, qui s’acoquine avec des sonorités oï et un état d’esprit hardcore. Du tout bon !

attributes.title: THE CHISEL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/20jscDXkBqf0euv7zSsyTx?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RaXu_5PWxFc?si=oBzGjocxjeyRUt8_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: During their school career, the student THE CHISEL did not choose the “piss, nihilism and dead rat” option, the stock in trade of many other of his punk classmates. If the common core takes up the clichés affiliated with the genre (velocity, aggressiveness and foul-mouthed lyrics), this good-natured British combo flourishes in its journey through devilishly bouncy and melodic music at times which combines with oï sounds and a hardcore state of mind. All good!

attributes.title: TURNSTILE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2qnpHrOzdmOo1S4ox3j17x?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/D6yaJur9JUE?si=fvpXe2fm1TBM-MMY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Il est bien loin ce temps où le tourniquet de Baltimore donnait son 1er concert hexagonal dans la cave voûtée d’un bar parisien. Mais déjà on détectait chez le quintet l’aura des plus grands. Une décennie plus tard, son hardcore versatile et décomplexé a explosé tous les codes du genre. Sa positive attitude permanente et sa décontraction insolente en font une sucrerie hardcore imparable. TURNSTILE : une machine à groove à l’éclectisme raffiné !

attributes.title: TURNSTILE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2qnpHrOzdmOo1S4ox3j17x?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/D6yaJur9JUE?si=fvpXe2fm1TBM-MMY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The time when TURNSTILE gave its first French concert in the cellar of a Parisian bar is long gone. But we already knew at the time that we face a band with a great future ahead. A decade later, the versatile Baltimore squad has exploded all the codes of the genre and has turned into a full force grooving machine!

attributes.title: BEYOND THE BLACK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6swnqiL41Bd4gO2fnAXXrf?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NGDlZTvJplo?si=IuJq1xZbVJkoEt1d" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Pourquoi tomber dans les clichés du genre et gaver son metal symphonique d’effets pompeux pour en légitimer l'appellation? BEYOND THE BLACK évite brillamment cet écueil en privilégiant une approche plus sobre, plus rock et aux vocaux variés, faisant place à une écriture misant sur l’efficacité. Le chant versatile et la présence scénique de la magnétique Jennifer Haben sont les figures de proue du groupe de Mannheim, dont la maîtrise des grands espaces scéniques n’est plus à démontrer.

attributes.title: BEYOND THE BLACK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6swnqiL41Bd4gO2fnAXXrf?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NGDlZTvJplo?si=IuJq1xZbVJkoEt1d" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Why fall into clichés and stuff your symphonic metal with pompous effects? BEYOND THE BLACK brilliantly avoids this pitfall with a more sober, more rock approach with varied vocals, giving way to writing focusing on efficiency. The versatile singing and stage presence of the magnetic Jennifer Haben are the leading figures of the Mannheim group whose mastery of large stages no longer needs to be demonstrated.

attributes.title: DREAM THEATER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2aaLAng2L2aWD2FClzwiep?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2IPT60hvGw4?si=RMJEEYxXbOxCifTJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Groupe déjà hors-norme lors de ses lointains débuts en 1985, le titan américain continue comme à l’époque de carburer au Super avec une forme étincelante et une ligne artistique toujours aussi audacieuse. Le credo du groupe : du metal progressif cérébral mais tout sauf prise de tête et dont la technicité atteint le paroxysme. Sans pour autant tomber dans la vaine démonstration vaniteuse ou l’onanisme du manche. Du grand art !

attributes.title: DREAM THEATER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2aaLAng2L2aWD2FClzwiep?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2IPT60hvGw4?si=RMJEEYxXbOxCifTJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The American titan continues to display sparkling form and daring music after forty years of an impeccable career. Inspiration and risk-taking have always been the driving forces of the group. 2025 marks only DREAM THEATER's fourth appearance at the festival: let's enjoy the event and the concert of this group at the top of its art.

attributes.title: FREAK KITCHEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0HtEZODdzPzZhdehDcF3fX?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6nmYAuAlNEw?si=ddK7GaNt9aBfWtCB" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le rock déluré de FREAK KITCHEN est un mélange loufoque de heavy metal et d’influences avant-gardistes progressives (entre autres !) associé à une écriture accrocheuse, des structures rythmiques déroutantes et des tonalités aventureuses qui échappent à tout étiquetage. Maîtrisant génialement l’art de la scène, les trublions scandinaves ne manqueront pas l’occasion de se transformer en pyromanes le temps d’un set qui s’annonce incandescent !

attributes.title: FREAK KITCHEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0HtEZODdzPzZhdehDcF3fX?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6nmYAuAlNEw?si=ddK7GaNt9aBfWtCB" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: FREAK KITCHEN's style of music is an original, yet identifiable mixture of heavy metal, progressive avant-garde and Indian carnatic influences, paired with catchy songwriting, baffling rhythm structures and adventurous tonalities that escape genre labelling. Having established a passionate, loyal and ever-growing fan base, the band is steadily touring all corners of the world, lighting up the crowds at small clubs as well as vast festival venues.

attributes.title: JUDAS PRIEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2tRsMl4eGxwoNabM08Dm4I?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zLPaGqGzdY0?si=hek-5D0E8bUzmwil" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Inoxydable, increvable, invincible ! La cuirasse de la mythique formation des West Midlands n’a jamais paru aussi rutilante qu’aujourd’hui ! Déjouant tous les pronostics et atomisant les attentes et la concurrence avec une aisance écœurante avec des albums inspirés comme jamais et des performances scéniques à s’en décrocher la mâchoire, la légende est bien vivante ! Du cuir, des clous, des flammes, des hymnes intemporels faisant la part belle aux guitares tranchantes : plus que du heavy metal : LE HEAVY METAL !

attributes.title: JUDAS PRIEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2tRsMl4eGxwoNabM08Dm4I?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zLPaGqGzdY0?si=hek-5D0E8bUzmwil" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Stainless, indestructible, invincible! The armour of the legendary West Midlands group has never looked as gleaming as it does today! Defeating all predictions and atomising expectations and competition with sickening ease with albums inspired as never before and jaw-dropping stage performances, the legend is alive and well! Leather, studs, flames, timeless anthems with sharp guitars: more than some heavy metal, this is HEAVY METAL!

attributes.title: MAJESTICA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/52lkxAYfC9ypaPJ2EB22ki?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aqW7wHNCc9M?si=_IemFhbDd6Lk_L_z" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: L’arrivée des vaillants Suédois dans le panorama du power metal en 2019 (après des premiers soubresauts prometteurs sous le nom de ReinXeed) n’a pas bousculé sauvagement ses codes mais a toutefois permis d’insuffler un vent de fraîcheur et d’inspiration bienvenue à un genre qui peut se reposer sur ses lauriers. Mélodies envoûtantes, riffs puissants, refrains épiques : rien ne manque et est bonifié par une dextérité renversante et un panache incontestable.

attributes.title: MAJESTICA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/52lkxAYfC9ypaPJ2EB22ki?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aqW7wHNCc9M?si=_IemFhbDd6Lk_L_z" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Sweden’s MAJESTICA has made a significant impact in the metal community since its inception in 2019 (and before since they were formerly known as ReinXeed). Their work is a blend of soaring melodies and powerful instrumentation that has established them as prominent players in the power metal scene. A spellbinding experience with mighty riffs and epic choruses.

attributes.title: PEYTON PARRISH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/62uiaKAdkbY94iXJnXyKzc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Voilà un artiste issu de cette nouvelle génération qui ne s’embarrasse guère avec les « qu'en-dira-t-on ? ». Après s’être fait connaître à la face du monde avec une reprise de la chanson du jeu Assassin's Creed Valhalla ("My Mother Told Me" - incluse ensuite dans la série Vikings), ce chanteur, compositeur, producteur et youtubeur Américain ultra prolifique ne cesse depuis de créer des titres d’inspirations viking mêlés d’influences post-grunge.

attributes.title: PEYTON PARRISH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/62uiaKAdkbY94iXJnXyKzc?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1ac2OcrKYPE?si=9mGIugewdqQOh8WF" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: This is an artist who is not interested, nor bothered, by what people think of him. After making himself known with a cover of the song from the game Assassin's Creed Valhalla ("My Mother Told Me"), this ultra prolific American-singer-composer-producer-YouTuber has since carried on the good work with Viking-inspired songs mixed with influences post-grunge.

attributes.title: ROSS THE BOSS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7iOaIkOG63D70TyWiqfn45?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vIiXhtl8cLg?si=KBDywPOrxpBQiJmS" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Membre fondateur de Manowar, Ross Friedman, alias ROSS THE BOSS, a depuis belle lurette pris son envol et ne cesse de porter haut et fort les couleurs du heavy metal dans la plus belle et pure tradition, sans toutefois user de la grandiloquence de certains… Simple, sans fioritures, un amour du travail bien fait, un pacte  acté dans le sang, avec le heavy avec un grand H ! Le King of Metal, le vrai ! Other bands play, ROSS THE BOSS kills !

attributes.content: Founding member of Manowar, Ross Friedman, aka ROSS THE BOSS, now perpetuates the tradition of heavy metal under his own name and in the most beautiful and pure way. Without using the grandiloquence of some others... The King of Metal, the real one! Other bands play, ROSS THE BOSS kills!

attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3N1B1g6JtIgd6ClRkzD4yT?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: La belle surprise que voilà : le retour sur les planches de la légende SAVATAGE, après une décennie d'absence scénique et avec un somptueux line-up pour l’occasion, constitué de Zak Stevens, Al Pitrelli, Chris Caffery, John Lee Middleton et Jeff Plate. Un set à la saveur évènementielle pour célébrer en grande pompe l’excellence de la flamboyante formation ricaine et son cocktail unique de thrash, progressif, power metal et hard rock. Grandissime !

attributes.title: SAVATAGE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3N1B1g6JtIgd6ClRkzD4yT?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: What a truly great surprise: SAVATAGE back to the stage after a decade of absence and with a sumptuous line-up for the occasion: Zak Stevens, Al Pitrelli, Chris Caffery, John Lee Middleton and Jeff Plate. How nice! Let’s celebrate SAVATAGE’s flamboyant and unique cocktail of thrash, progressive rock, power metal and hard rock. Enjoy!

attributes.title: AUDREY HORNE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7HudjH2VxKdpK8nj2U6yls?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Du heavy rock crépitant et explosif comme l’huile sur le feu ! Voilà le mode d’expression du quintet norvégien depuis bientôt un quart de siècle ! Mêlant avec ingéniosité et panache le meilleur de Van Halen, Ozzy et du Iron Maiden des premiers albums, Toschie et ses potes font feu de tout bois avec des compos rentre-dedans et/ou à tiroirs avec un sens de la fête irrépressible. Un des meilleurs groupes live du circuit, les amis !

attributes.title: AUDREY HORNE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7HudjH2VxKdpK8nj2U6yls?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Fuel to the fire – that’s what relentless hard rock outfit AUDREY HORNE ignites! What started back in 2002 soon took the Norwegians and their expertly-executed, riff-soaked fury all the way to the top of the rock scene. Their work is some massive and festive heavy rock music full of infectious earworms! Probably one of the best live acst nowadays. Top-notch!

attributes.title: BLACK COUNTRY COMMUNION
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7by60V2ChbeiVhwXK5Jk6l?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Un groupe uniquement composé de pointures au CV maousse costaud ! Jugez du peu : Glenn Hugues, Joe Bonamassa, Jason Bonham et Derek Sherinian, autant dire qu’il n’usurpe pas sa qualification de « super groupe ». Si le talent est indéniable sur le papier, la matérialisation physique ne déçoit pas et les compositions sont un festin pour les esgourdes : la quintessence du classic rock et du blues rock… En mieux !

attributes.title: BLACK COUNTRY COMMUNION
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7by60V2ChbeiVhwXK5Jk6l?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/u62HT0mqo9I?si=hS1xIZCyKJBZRxPM" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: BLACK COUNTRY COMMUNION is a powerhouse classic rock/blues rock supergroup fusing the incredible talents of Glenn Hughes Joe Bonamassa, Jason Bonham and Derek Sherinian. The reputation they’ve cultivated after 15 years since their inception, not only as amazing songwriters, but as a powerful live act, is only exceeded by their dedication to their craft and willingness to challenge each other to make the best music imaginable.

attributes.title: LUCIE SUE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6ToQCnRGaGmhn4yziwMEh3?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Personnage aussi décalé que créatif, LUCIE SUE n’est pas une inconnue pour le public du Hellfest puisqu’en 2022 elle a eu le privilège de tenir la basse de Steel Panther le temps d’un featuring mémorable. Et cette année, c’est un set rien que pour elle et son groupe qui lui est offert. Entre rock 90’s, indie anglais et alternatif américain, elle déploiera son incroyable positivité et vous mettra en joie pour toute la journée.

attributes.title: LUCIE SUE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6ToQCnRGaGmhn4yziwMEh3?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Aw_zdWE4VKU?si=AeM2V4JHTSNrXgvC" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Lucie SUE is an artist who made herself known to the Hellfest audience by providing some bass duties during the Steel Panther concert in 2022. This year, she returns to give a concert as an artist in her own right. Her mix of rock with various influences has everything to seduce you and should put a smile on your face all day long.

attributes.title: MYLES KENNEDY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2YZOQlBE1v44RxPEAVSdVR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7_LXR96kh9s?si=srSlUMP14uVPG4qY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: C’est toujours un plaisir mais aussi une sacrée fierté d’accueillir un artiste de son calibre, sans conteste l’un des meilleurs vocalistes sur la Planète Rock. Mais aussi l’un des plus sympathiques. Ici, point de Pont Alter ou de guitariste à chapeau haute-forme pour accompagner le sémillant MYLES KENNEDY puisque ce dernier se présentera ici dans son plus simple appareil (on se calme les filles : on veut dire par là qu’il se produit en artiste solo).

attributes.title: MYLES KENNEDY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2YZOQlBE1v44RxPEAVSdVR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7_LXR96kh9s?si=srSlUMP14uVPG4qY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: It’s always a pleasure and also a real pride to welcome such an artist, who is without doubt one of the best rock vocalists today. Here, there is no Alter Bridge or Slash to accompany MYLES KENNEDY: he comes as a solo artist to share with us the fruit of his work and his inspiration of the moment. Rock as it should always be: raw, pure and inspired.

attributes.title: SATCHVAI BAND : JOE SATRIANI & STEVE VAI
attributes.content: Après cinq décennies d’amitié musicale, JOE SATRIANI et STEVE VAI franchissent enfin le pas et collaborent pour la 1ère fois à la création commune de musique. Ces deux guitaristes légendaires, considérés, à juste titre, comme des guitar-heroes, combinent leurs technicités et leurs virtuosités pour un résultat encore plus grand que la somme de leurs talents. Une dextérité époustouflante et écœurante devant laquelle nous ne pouvons que nous incliner !

attributes.title: SATCHVAI BAND : JOE SATRIANI & STEVE VAI
attributes.content: Celebrating nearly five decades of musical friendship, JOE SATRIANI and STEVE VAI collaborate on music for the first time! Witnessing these two guitar virtuosos is a once-in-a-lifetime experience for any rock/shred guitar fanatic. They will trade blistering songs, dazzling the crowd with their otherworldly skills. You would have to be crazy to miss such an event.

attributes.title: SCORPIONS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/27T030eWyCQRmDyuvr1kxY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n4RjJKxsamQ?si=cxRIOVJWSXZLK5HV" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Retour à Clisson du plus célèbre des arthropodes teutons, toujours pas rassasié 60 ans après ses premières piqûres. Le dard toujours dressé, l’inépuisable bestiole ne manquera pas de multiplier les attaques avec la fougue et la maestria qu’on lui connaît. Riffs puissants, hymnes fédérateurs, mélodies subtiles : les ingrédients de la venimeuse musique du quintet sont connus depuis des lustres et sont d’une efficacité sans égal et jubilatoire.

attributes.title: SCORPIONS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/27T030eWyCQRmDyuvr1kxY?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n4RjJKxsamQ?si=cxRIOVJWSXZLK5HV" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: They have stung rock lovers to the core, slipping a rebellious venom into their veins by surprise. Scorpions is not a band like the others: they have changed the game. Powerful riffs, unifying anthems, subtle melodies: against all odds, Scorpions is a gentle artifice in a world of brutes. A fiery show, seductive energy, unstoppable refrains: under sounds to make space-time bugger, the Lower Saxon bosses, influenced by the flights of Led Zeppelin and the acrimony of Deep Purple, continue to make the shadows waltz and lighter dance.

attributes.title: THE SOUTHERN RIVER BAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/77giZvm3lPMYiI79FmmS31?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Vous aimez votre rock plutôt « hard à l’australienne » ? Son arôme « southern » est votre péché mignon ? Et vous le kiffez aussi en mode « bluesy » ? Parfait ! THE SOUTHERN RIVER BAND est justement une jeune formation conciliant les différentes influences avec une dextérité écœurante et sur laquelle il va falloir sérieusement compter pour les années à venir. Rendez-vous est pris sur le pré pour un bon bottage de fesses comme on les aime.

attributes.title: THE SOUTHERN RIVER BAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/77giZvm3lPMYiI79FmmS31?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/62Vfzet8XIA?si=Q173PjBFTRNifvnG" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: THE SOUTHERN RIVER BAND is a young band offering rock n' roll with multiple influences (southern, bluesy, hard) and a lot of inspiration. The dexterity is sickening and the enthusiasm displayed is irresistible. It's definitely a band to be reckoned with from now on and the years to come. See you in front of the Mainstages for some good ass-kicking

attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/44tQC1PjxXIpEgW0i8uN00?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Mark Tremonti serait-il un guitariste insatiable ? Fort d’une carrière déjà bien remplie avec Creed et Alter Bridge, il trouve néanmoins le temps d’accoucher régulièrement d’albums (déjà 6 !) sous son propre nom. Il profite de cet espace de liberté à sa créativité pour enfanter un metal alternatif authentique, racé et riche en émotions. La machine à tubes TREMONTI est de retour, ça va chauffer en Mainstage !

attributes.title: TREMONTI
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/44tQC1PjxXIpEgW0i8uN00?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5MLqCenzsbI?si=OLbkvfVci0tUEpbN" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: With an already busy career with Creed and Alter Bridge, Mark Tremonti nevertheless finds the time to regularly release albums under his own name. He takes advantage of this space of freedom for his creativity to create an alternative metal that is authentic, racy and rich in emotions. The TREMONTI hit machine is back and is going to heat up in the Mainstage!

attributes.title: RUSSIAN CIRCLES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0AZ3VR0YbFcS0Kgei7L2QF?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PUf9_1jsCyY?si=WGuUzMd4y65ZC4-W" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Une guitare, une basse, une batterie. C’est tout… Ou presque. Car derrière cette apparente simplicité de façade du trio chicagoan se cache un talent démesuré pour vous transporter loin du tumulte de la vie courante. Massif et mélancolique, vous lâcherez prise face à ce son qui emporte tout, mais, avec toute la délicatesse dont il sait faire preuve, il caresse l’échine afin d’apaiser la douleur. Un moment de grâce s’offre à vous.

attributes.title: RUSSIAN CIRCLES
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0AZ3VR0YbFcS0Kgei7L2QF?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: RUSSIAN CIRCLES. Behind this name hides an inordinate talent. A group whose music will take you far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Massive and melancholic, their music carries everything with infinite delicacy and soothes the pain. A moment of grace. Just for you.

attributes.content: Après quelques tourments dans son line-up, la formation tricolore profite de l’arrivée d’une nouvelle frontwoman, Camille Contreras, pour rebondir. La force de frappe de son mélange de djent et de metalcore aux pourtours mélodiques ne s’en trouve que décuplée. Une nouvelle mouture pour un nouveau départ. Et bande de veinards, c’est à vous que revient le privilège de profiter de la déferlante NOVELISTS !

attributes.content: The instability of the line-up now belongs to the past for the French crew. The recruitment of a first-rate vocalist, Camille Contreras, has increased their impact and nothing can stop them now. The daring mix of djent and melodic metalcore is reaching new heights: the future is bright for NOVELISTS.

attributes.title: A Day to Remember
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4NiJW4q9ichVqL1aUsgGAN?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Exercice ô combien périlleux en 2025 que d’essayer de se démarquer au sein de la sphère post-hardcore. Pourtant les petits gars d’Ocala, Floride, s’échinent depuis plus de 20 ans et incarnent la parfaite symbiose du punk, de la pop et du metalcore. Avec leur son frais et énergisant gavé de breakdowns et un chant dément renforcé de chœurs stupéfiants, ils contentent les fans de hardcore métallique autant que les aficionados de punk pop.

attributes.title: A Day to Remember
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4NiJW4q9ichVqL1aUsgGAN?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: It’s no easy feat to stand out in the crowded post-hardcore scene, but these hardworking Ocala, Florida natives have been doing just that for over 20 years. A flawless fusion of punk, pop, and metalcore, their fresh, electrifying sound—packed with crushing breakdowns and ferocious vocals—delights fans of metallic hardcore as much as punk-pop enthusiasts.

attributes.title: CATTLE DECAPITATION
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/67ZMMtA88DDO0gTuRrzGjn?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Quel sublime paradoxe que d’être le gérant d’une boucherie-charcuterie et d’être, en même temps végan et ardent défenseur de la cause animale. Et nos 4 Ricains ont beau être adeptes de la méthode bien-être par la doublette quinoa/tofu, ils vous donnent un cours magistral en matière de dépeçage de bidoche, dans un bain tout ce qu’il y a de plus sanguinolent. Amis des bêtes et de gros death qui tâche, il est l’heure de rentrer dans le lard !

attributes.title: CATTLE DECAPITATION
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/67ZMMtA88DDO0gTuRrzGjn?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: This group is a paradox. Fierce musical butchers and at the same time ambassadors of veganism and ardent defenders of the animal cause. They may be very fond of quinoa and tofu but these brutes excel in the interpretation of a bestial and bloody death metal. What about a little tour of their very own slaughterhouse?

attributes.title: DETHKLOK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7u12AuhJ5AaJIgZAZe0US8?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: À l’origine, simple groupe fictif issu de Metalocalypse, série d’animation parodiant tous les préjugés et clichés de la scène metal, il s’est rapidement matérialisé en entité vivante et respirante. Et quelle idée de génie que ce passage du virtuel au réel, tant l’interaction entre musique et animation se fait en parfaite symbiose. Bien plus qu’une simple expérience auditive, DETHKLOK est une odyssée animée dans le monde merveilleux du death metal.

attributes.title: DETHKLOK
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7u12AuhJ5AaJIgZAZe0US8?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/H2ManC9QcNs?si=XRtPBMISApRaPK1M" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Originally a simple fictional group from Metalocalypse, an animated series dealing with the clichés of the metal scene, DETHKLOK quickly materialised into a living and breathing entity. What a brilliant idea! The mutation from virtual to real is truly perfect. Much more than just a musical experience, DETHKLOK is a lively odyssey into the wonderful world of death metal.

attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7JjFSi8Nz49BxuZcoTHc7L?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Oh ! Quelle jolie petite boule de poils, avec sa trogne trop-trop mignonne : on en mangerait. Eh bien, c’est exactement ce que font nos 4 Transalpins. Mais avant de bouffer tout cru ce charmant petit rongeur, ils vont lui fracasser le crâne, le dépecer, l’écarteler, lui arracher les membres et probablement lui infliger encore deux ou trois sévices bien sentis. Mais rassuez-vous, aucun animal n’a été maltraité durant la rédaction de ce texte.

attributes.title: GUINEAPIG
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7JjFSi8Nz49BxuZcoTHc7L?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: GUINEAPIG is an Italian goregrind unit formed in 2013, fascinated by splatter movies, medical experiments and rare diseases, fueled by ultra-massive riffs and guttural vocals. A cutting-edge and forward-thinking vision, without ever losing sight of the roots, with a songwriting fluctuating between abysmal tunings, death metal mid-tempos and ripping breakdowns. Expect nothing but the heaviest goregrind.

attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5CmgfDQq0YVKMP6zpjYhPR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Le caca, c’est tabou, on en viendra tous à bout… Ou pas : devise non-officielle de nos amis tchèques, passés maîtres dans la glorification de la matière fécale sous toutes ses formes. Peu importe l’état de votre transit, un live de GUTALAX, ça vaut son pesant de caca-huètes. Constipés ou diarrhéiques, vous êtes cordialement invités à la Fête de l’Étron qui se profile en Altar. Une visite d’un gros intestin en version XXL, ça ne se refuse pas !

attributes.title: GUTALAX
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5CmgfDQq0YVKMP6zpjYhPR?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: These Czechs love poop and are happy to demonstrate it. Armed with guitars and anti-bacterial suits, this fanciful crew advocates digestion and diarrhea to the sound of a groovy grindcore and porcine screams. Festive and crazy atmosphere in perspective for this concert which serves as a giant colonoscopy!

attributes.title: SIGNS OF THE SWARM
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0yxJx8OEyDfd7dzLsFuNrS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Un metal extrême intense et sauvage ! Du putain de deathcore qui suinte le brutal death metal par tous les pores et les orifices ! Des vociférations, des cris porcins, des blastbeats effrénés, des breaks écrasants, des guitares faisant office de marteaux-pilons ! Amis de la poésie, passez gentiment votre chemin ! Ou plutôt, venez découvrir la nouvelle pépite ricaine et assister à ce passage à tabac dans les règles de l’art !

attributes.title: SIGNS OF THE SWARM
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0yxJx8OEyDfd7dzLsFuNrS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Extreme metal full of testosterone! Wild and furious! Fucking deathcore that oozes brutal death metal from every pore and orifice! Vociferations, squeals, frantic blastbeats, crushing breaks, sledgehammers as guitars! Poetry lovers, please go on your way! Or rather come and discover the new deathcore sensation. A true beating to come!

attributes.title: TSAR
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4jeNXbyvbOtY0pUCJoVNqI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Entouré de ses 4 Acolytes, le Baron, personnage aussi mystérieux que charismatique, mélange extravagance et mystère pour haranguer les foules. TSAR fusionne un metal progressif avec des rythmiques groovesques au possible, surplombés de la voix puissante de son maître de cérémonie. Chaque concert des Nantais devient un bal mélodieux et frénétique, un show théâtral appelant la foule à participer sans réserve au spectacle.

attributes.title: TSAR
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4jeNXbyvbOtY0pUCJoVNqI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rsWQcVLZBm0?si=P5QGae--s19hizV1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: TSAR features The Baron, the main antagonist as mysterious as he is quirky, surrounded by his 4 Acolytes, devoted servants or unsuspected manipulators... Only time will tell. He is a representative figure of power, a form of inverted satire criticizing our morals from the fictional point of view of a high-ranking character in society.

attributes.title: UNE MISERE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6sKJNakiqvj2AhI1qdRsgS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
