attributes.content: UNE MISÈRE est le point culminant d'amitiés familiales, de dévotion musicale, de tragédies, de dépendance et de fusion de membres de groupes aux styles extrêmement différents. Un groupe inspiré par les aspects les plus sombres de l'Islande. Un collectif avec un son qui repousse les limites et explore les profondeurs. UNE MISERE n'est pas qu'un groupe, mais une expérience. Un mouvement. Et un fléau.

attributes.title: UNE MISERE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6sKJNakiqvj2AhI1qdRsgS?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sut_LP3r5Vc?si=SrOM_abmKxp3PNI7" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: UNE MISÈRE is the culmination of familiar friendships, musical devotion, hardening tragedy, addiction, and the fusing of band mates with wildly different styles. A group of artists from various hardcore bands, inspired by Iceland’s darkest and most bleak aspects, joined forces to create UNE MISÈRE. A collective with a sound that pushes boundaries and cuts deep. UNE MISÈRE is not just a band but an experience, a movement and a plague.

attributes.title: UNLEASHED
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3MKwCexzAd8YTdsSjRkKbv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S72MNNQGqjY?si=9ZqdmoZfhMoG_EWj" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Membre éminent du carré d’as du death metal old school émanant du royaume de la sacro-sainte étagère Billy et des sandwichs au cerf, UNLEASHED se démarque de ses sympathiques camarades de boisson d’Entombed, Dismember et Grave par son vibrant attachement à la culture viking et à la mythologie nordique auxquelles il ne manque jamais de faire allusion, ou à leur rendre virilement hommage sur fond de guitares qui défouraillent sévèrement.

attributes.title: UNLEASHED
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3MKwCexzAd8YTdsSjRkKbv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S72MNNQGqjY?si=9ZqdmoZfhMoG_EWj" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Do you want fucking riffs? UNLEASHED have got ‘em! One of the big four of Swedish death metal, UNLEASHED are one of the most devastating acts to ever come out of Scandinavia. The bands devastating riffs and tormented vocals have cut a path of insanity across European metal festivals over parts of five decades. Join them and give yourself to the pit – the Suede masters are waiting for you to drown in volume and mosh it up!

attributes.title: Aluk Todolo
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0rsqCX5hTBb0H2Ha2OyD5i?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Occulte. S’il est bien un terme qui définit l’œuvre proposée par ce trio d’esthètes, c’est assurément celui-ci. Bien difficile de définir ce son qui explore toutes les facettes de la musique expérimentale pour en ressortir sa vision sombre et unique. Black metal, krautrock, avant-garde, drone, psyché, jazz, noise s’entremêlent dans une mutation sonore extrême. Transcendantale et hypnotique, nul ne sort indemne de cette expérience occulte.

attributes.title: Aluk Todolo
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0rsqCX5hTBb0H2Ha2OyD5i?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lmMaBlPSOuw?si=CPxWo_59XifvbO9l" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: There is one word that defines the work proposed by this trio of aesthetes: occult. The combo explores all facets of experimental music and bring out their own dark vision of it. Black metal, krautrock, avant-garde, drone, psyche, jazz, noise, all mixed as an extreme sound mutation. Transcendental and hypnotic, no one comes out unscathed of this experience.

attributes.title: EISBRECHER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6ul6vL8Hg5jTulDi0Ac8ao?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Si l’Allemagne a cette image de rigueur et de froideur, elle le doit en partie à sa langue. À moins que ce ne soit à cause de son industrie automobile ou pharmaceutique très présente... Pour nous, c’est bien sa musique, martiale à ses heures, qui donne ce ton austère. Le cuirassé EISBRECHER sonne la charge et fonce dans le tas, armé de son metal indus d’une solidité à toute épreuve. Vous allez vous faire hurler dessus en allemand et vous allez kiffer !

attributes.title: EISBRECHER
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6ul6vL8Hg5jTulDi0Ac8ao?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: Founded by two ex-members of Megaherz, one of the greatest German industrial bands – EISBRECHER, far from crafting a simple clone, has built their own path as one of the titans of the genre. With more than 20 years of music behind them and a truly Bavarian sentiment, these Teutonic swashbucklers have only seen their popularity grow. With no reason to stop, their frigid sounds become ever more hyperborean.

attributes.title: GRAVEKVLT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0zwShdoT8rUpQguv3FG48B?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4Jcr0G7gLAU?si=bv7Tdf8uqyhQZP6t" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Retour au metal extrême et aux films d’horreur bon marché du début des années 80, avec une attitude rock’n’roll et GRAVEKVLT aux manettes. En seulement quelques années d'existence, ces speed-metalleux sont devenus l'un des groupes les plus bandants de la scène underground française. Un mélange de speed, de punk et de black metal, assaisonné d’un sens inné du refrain-de-la-mort-qui-tue. Préparez-vous pour un voyage à travers la puanteur des cimetières, le sang séché et les amplis en fusion !

attributes.title: GRAVEKVLT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0zwShdoT8rUpQguv3FG48B?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4Jcr0G7gLAU?si=bv7Tdf8uqyhQZP6t" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Evil Speed Metal Punk. GRAVEKVLT is a throwback to early 80’s extreme metal, cheap horror movies, with a rock’n’roll attitude. In only a couple of years of existence, these evil speed-metallers have become one of the most promising acts of the French underground scene. A blend of speed, punk and black metal, seasoned with an evil dose of chorus. Get ready for a trip through the stench of ancient graves, dried blood and burning amplifiers.

attributes.title: PRIEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6niO7WSbw5n0nD58jPi2Mx?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WktdbbYQegQ?si=asRdonrIvfkLoFfW" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Chers fidèles, n’ayez pas peur et approchez. Venez pousser les portes du Temple. Il est temps pour vous de venir expier vos péchés, et PRIEST est justement là pour vous accueillir. Le confessionnal prend des allures de nightclub où les néons phosphorescents remplacent les cierges et le sermon de ce guide spirituel suédois vient guider l’Humanité vers la prochaine étape de son évolution : la fusion de l’homme avec les machines.

attributes.title: PRIEST
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6niO7WSbw5n0nD58jPi2Mx?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WktdbbYQegQ?si=asRdonrIvfkLoFfW" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Dear faithful, do not be afraid, approach and push open the doors of the Temple. It is time for you to come and atone for your sins. PRIEST is here to welcome you. The confessional is a nightclub where phosphorescent neon lights replace candles. The sermon will guide you to the next stage of humanity's evolution: the merger of man with machines.

attributes.title: SHAÂRGHOT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0wxpqCSmhtwnRXoWPoHAcj?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p3l8A_i_pK0?si=0l4zqBK7ExF_fDmV" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Débarqué tout droit de son monde cyberpunk, le monstre SHAÂRGHOT n’en finit pas de dynamiter le paysage musical, en profitant au passage pour détruire le peu de barrières existant encore au sein de la scène metal. Il sème la désolation au moyen de performances scéniques aussi dansantes que percutantes. Vous êtes cordialement invités à cette jolie fête post-apocalyptique qui se prépare. Venez remuer votre corps dans ce monde en ruines.

attributes.title: SHAÂRGHOT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0wxpqCSmhtwnRXoWPoHAcj?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p3l8A_i_pK0?si=0l4zqBK7ExF_fDmV" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: This isn't just about music, far from it. The band comes to us straight from a parallel, cyberpunk, nightmarish dimension. Initially conceived as an electro-industrial metal project, the character of SHAÂRGHOT, has gradually been embodied on stage. SHAÂRGHOT's sounds are first and foremost borrowed from industrial metal, electro and punk. SHAÂRGHOT has established itself as a major figure on the industrial underground scene, rallying a loyal following of fans steeped in its unique universe.

attributes.title: THE CEMETARY GIRLZ
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3tDzQjTvwtfs5vAJRGcxlF?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_vvLlDGH198?si=unyp1SxJ83hLSedR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Si vous ne savez que faire de vos dimanches aprèm, rien de tel qu’une petite balade au cimetière. Nul besoin de passer chez le fleuriste avant. Pour notre trio, la déambulation entre les tombes ne s’apparente en rien à un recueillement auprès d’un défunt mais rime simplement avec mélancolie sombre. La solitude de l’ambiance gothique se mêle à la crasse deathrock dans une atmosphère solennelle et lugubre qui vous enveloppe dans un voile noir.

attributes.title: THE CEMETARY GIRLZ
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3tDzQjTvwtfs5vAJRGcxlF?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_vvLlDGH198?si=unyp1SxJ83hLSedR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Pioneer of the French “goth/batcave/deathrock” revival of the 2000s, THE CEMETARY GIRLZ has become a cult band but also an inspiration for many groups today. The renewed interest in the coldwave and post-punk scenes highlights the quality and inspiration of the trio who, without a doubt, will win over many fans during the weekend.

attributes.title: THE KOVENANT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/31VNYr7yK0xBD6MfIaucLJ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PjLvDTmEb98?si=K1LDhpRifCQ2SOjL" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Disparu des radars depuis plus d’une décennie, le space metal déjanté des Norvégiens risque de traumatiser les tympans de plus d’un fan de trve black metal ou tout esprit conservateur dès lors qu’il est question de metal extrême ! Si leurs oreilles sont rodées aux assauts des déflagrations les plus viles et haineuses, les sonorités cybernétiques et les rythmes dansants s’annoncent clivants ! Mais il sera difficile de résister à une telle énergie et à une envie irrépressible d’entrer dans la trance.

attributes.title: THE KOVENANT
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/31VNYr7yK0xBD6MfIaucLJ?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PjLvDTmEb98?si=K1LDhpRifCQ2SOjL" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Very discreet for more than a decade, the crazy space metal of these mad Norwegians might traumatise the eardrums of more than one fan of trve black metal or of any conservative spirit when it comes to extreme metal! The cybernetic sounds and dancing rhythms promise to be quite a shock! But it will be difficult to resist such energetic and irrepressible desire to go into trance.

attributes.title: UNTO OTHERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1W5khHrkcznsyChxwIBfAI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eRGtKM-IdUM?si=gWuN2Cw85Y6ucVo4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Et si nous tenions tout simplement-là, les dignes successeurs de Type O Negative et des Sisters Of Mercy ? Il faut dire qu’aussi macabre que dansante, l’œuvre du groupe de l’Oregon n’est ni dénuée de charme, ni d’ambition. Carburant avec un son très personnel mêlant intelligemment heavy metal old-school, goth rock, new wave et post-punk, UNTO OTHERS s’extirpe du peloton et prend ses distances avec la concurrence. Efficace et entêtant.

attributes.title: UNTO OTHERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1W5khHrkcznsyChxwIBfAI?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eRGtKM-IdUM?si=gWuN2Cw85Y6ucVo4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: UNTO OTHERS might be the successors to Type O Negative and the Sisters Of Mercy. Fueled by relentless dedication and fiery passion for music creation and audience connection, UNTO OTHERS charges forwards. Their distinctive sound (blend of old-school heavy metal, goth, new wave and post-punk) reverberates through the veins of contemporary heavy metal, solidifying their position in the genre’s evolving landscape.

attributes.title: BLACK BILE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4skBbkxAjVaqb2f2RBxpuM?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jxitb9enIx8?si=rDkswBKuZJ94M0zS" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: BLACK BILE esquisse un tableau mélancolique et torturé, aux teintes doom et post-metal. Le quintet lorientais s'affirme entre douceur et dévastation, vogue de souffles hypnotiques en hurlements impérieux, auxquels répondent des arpèges subtils qui se muent en énergies orageuses. Entre ombre et lumière, une musique en guise d’oratoire personnel pour tout auditeur, un refuge dans lequel vous allez plonger et vous recueillir.

attributes.title: BLACK BILE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4skBbkxAjVaqb2f2RBxpuM?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jxitb9enIx8?si=rDkswBKuZJ94M0zS" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Emerging onto the music scene in 2017, BLACK BILE rose to prominence with their distinct blend of post-metal and doom. Their intense sound, inspired by groups like King Woman, Cult of Luna, Amenra and Oathbreaker, is a real aural wave. The Lorient-based quintet asserts itself between gentleness and devastation, moving from hypnotic breaths to imperious howls, responded to by subtle arpeggios which turn into storms.

attributes.title: FAETOOTH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6bAM7jeIX4pI5lZ0QoSZjt?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5s-UQ2Q0KZ0?si=HROg2pdzzw9O9NAX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Fermez simplement les yeux et écoutez. Laissez votre esprit vagabonder parmi cette forêt dans laquelle vous vous êtes égaré et ne faire qu’un avec cette nature ensorcelante. Vous êtes portés par la magie du lieu et ses mystères, mais écrasés par sa puissance. Sentez cette énergie qu’il dégage. Vulnérable face à tant de beauté, vous voilà prêts à affronter ce trio de fées et sa savoureuse mixture magique, féerique, ténébreuse.

attributes.title: FAETOOTH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6bAM7jeIX4pI5lZ0QoSZjt?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5s-UQ2Q0KZ0?si=HROg2pdzzw9O9NAX" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: FAETOOTH is a three-piece “fairy doom” band originating from Los Angeles. Formed in 2019, the group sought to navigate personal vulnerability and musical experimentation by delving deep into the nature of self, the beauty inherent in the natural world, and the captivating mysteries that surround us. Drawing inspiration from doom metal, black metal, shoegaze, and sludge, the term “fairy-doom” aptly characterizes their distinctive fusion of sounds.

attributes.title: HEALTH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6FfjnGXMhxSsJTuGLWBDth?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PZL1_sImzKY?si=Inqy4vubonT3sQ2y" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: HEALTH bouscule les codes et électrise les foules grâce à son rock indie décliné en version math rock à grand renfort de percussions tribales, de guitares hurlantes, de lignes de basse asymétriques et d’un instrument-maison appelé zoothorn. HEALTH fait partie de la lignée des groupes novateurs et révolutionnaires comme Nine Inch Nails et Ministry, qui ont redessiné les frontières entre le metal, l'électro et la musique pop. Et qui perpétuent la tradition avec classe.

attributes.title: HEALTH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6FfjnGXMhxSsJTuGLWBDth?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PZL1_sImzKY?si=Inqy4vubonT3sQ2y" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: HEALTH makes mathy indie rock with tribal drums, squealing guitars, asymmetrical basslines, and a homemade guitar pedal/microphone called a zoothorn. HEALTH joins the lineage of groundbreaking heavy acts like Nine Inch Nails and Ministry, which re-drew the borders between metal, electronic and pop music. It also speaks directly to the band’s young, fervent online subculture.

attributes.title: JERRY CANTRELL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5HUFo8AH9ZILmlyKFfEMNP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8DvcZha4W9M?si=-F-76WNgGCiBcBwJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: À la fois pionnier et icône majuscule de la scène de Seattle du début des années 1990 et défenseur des valeurs de la vieille école du classic rock, JERRY CANTRELL est une sorte d’anti-guitar hero. Privilégiant sobriété et subtilité, il distribue à l’envie des riffs à l'esthétique grunge, sombres et lourds mais nuancés et éclectiques. Loin de se contenter de paresseusement copier le groupe qui l’a installé au firmament, Alice In Chains, il trace sa route selon ses envies et pour son propre plaisir.

attributes.title: JERRY CANTRELL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5HUFo8AH9ZILmlyKFfEMNP?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8DvcZha4W9M?si=-F-76WNgGCiBcBwJ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Both a pioneer and a major icon of the Seattle scene of the early 1990s and defender of the old school values of classic rock, JERRY CANTRELL is a sort of anti-guitar hero. He subtlety offers riffs with a grunge aesthetic, dark and heavy but nuanced and eclectic. Far from being content with lazily copying the group that put him in the firmament, Alice In Chains, he traces his path according to his desires and for his own pleasure. And ours.

attributes.title: KYLESA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7mO0JGOATH8fVHvgCdZsXh?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VlbC-hk25Aw?si=GXRXnd9syR3nEcAh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: En annonçant une pause indéfinie il y a 9 ans, ces titans du sludge laissaient sur le bord de la route une palanquée de fans désabusés. La formation originaire de Savannah remet le couvert, prête à en découdre, avec l’ambition toujours intacte de vous emporter avec elle vers les contrées rageuses dont elle a le secret. Et avec une liste de prestations triées sur le volet, vous faites partie des rares privilégiés à pouvoir profiter de ces riffs aussi psychédéliques que pachydermiques.

attributes.title: KYLESA
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7mO0JGOATH8fVHvgCdZsXh?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VlbC-hk25Aw?si=GXRXnd9syR3nEcAh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: They’re back! On a hiatus since 2016 (that was far too long!), the sludge titans will play a couple of selected gigs this summer and Hellfest is on the list! But to simply call them a sludge band would be incorrect. Because KYLESA sound like no other and are trailblazers in the heavy rock / psych metal / stoner, etc. scenes, creating a style and sound uniquely their own while setting a path for many to follow. A concert not to be missed!

attributes.title: PRAYERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7a0G4CC3dZdKAAzVRnaRGu?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NFdT6ESvx0M?si=OhkrwOACSK36iPG9" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: La vision sombre et magique du duo dont la musique auto-proclamée « cholo goth » explore l’univers impitoyable des gangs et de la rue sur des rythmes lancinants et des synthétiseurs tourbillonnants. Cholo goth : un style hybride qui s'inspire de la darkwave des années 80, du hip-hop de la côte ouest et d'une multitude de styles électroniques. Audacieux, impétueux, rafraîchissant et sacrément accrocheur aussi. Et méchamment impactant !

attributes.title: PRAYERS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7a0G4CC3dZdKAAzVRnaRGu?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NFdT6ESvx0M?si=OhkrwOACSK36iPG9" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Prayers: a solemn request for help or expression of thanks addressed to God or an object of worship. But also PRAYERS: the dark, magical vision of cholo goth duo whose music explores the harsh realities of gang and street life over throbbing beats and swirling synthesizers. Cholo Goth: a hybrid style that takes influence from 80s darkwave, West Coast hip hop, and a host of electronic styles. Bold, brash, refreshing, and fairly catchy, too.

attributes.title: THOU
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4KoZpKiPeX4jIi7Euwcfuo?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5Ud1PECpSnk?si=eUDY3xItTZaWyLo4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le sludge nous a toujours montré ce qu'il avait de plus poisseux et de sale. Mais avec THOU, rien n'est jamais trop crade. Une violence sourde, lente, déchaînée, pesante et carrément malsaine est ancrée au plus profond du sextet louisianais. Vous céderez inexorablement devant ce déferlement de haine, porté par les cris de rage d’un Bryan Funck possédé. Une invitation à venir en découdre en vous perdant dans les méandres boueux des bayous.

attributes.title: THOU
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4KoZpKiPeX4jIi7Euwcfuo?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5Ud1PECpSnk?si=eUDY3xItTZaWyLo4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Nothing is ever way too dirty with THOU. A slow, unleashed, heavy and downright unhealthy violence is anchored deep within the work of the Baton-Rouge group. A surge of hatred, carried by the cries of rage of Bryan Funck, the possessed frontman. An invitation to come and fight while losing yourself in the muddy depths of the bayous.

attributes.title: CROWS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5LFuHlM7fW3xnIyBsDrGfn?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SsuD3Abaqcs?si=aAWXmYtNfkGyecvc" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les corbeaux londoniens sont en train de se bâtir une solide réputation grâce à l'intensité de leurs concerts où les musiciens ne s’économisent jamais quelles qu’en soient les conséquences pour leurs instruments et leur corps. Avec des compositions nerveuses, une énergie brute et chaotique en diable mais aussi des hectolitres de sueur, nul doute que CROWS donnera sa pleine mesure et éprouvera le public de la Valley comme jamais.

attributes.title: CROWS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5LFuHlM7fW3xnIyBsDrGfn?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SsuD3Abaqcs?si=aAWXmYtNfkGyecvc" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: London-based CROWS have built a considerable following over the last few years for the intensity of their live shows which have seen the band members break bones as well as instruments. One of the most electrifying live acts on the map. Known for their aggressive sound and chaotic energy, CROWS will transform Valley grounds into a frenzy of raw noise and sweat-soaked enthusiasm.

attributes.title: CALCINE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4bbaTWOj59xYMfrXjqS8X1?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UaapDSDcQXo?si=kUmXRxoqZLPbKQbZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: L’explosive scène du Paris Hardcore est en pleine effervescence, et au milieu des Worst Doubt, Sorcerer, Headbussa, Cold Decay ou autres Take It In Blood, CALCINE fait plus que tirer son épingle du jeu avec son hardcore metallisé teinté de hip-hop. Une bonne déflagration sonore sur fond de lyrics pointant du doigt tous les maux de notre société. Ça augure de la bonne grosse bagarre de bon matin pour les plus courageux !

attributes.title: CALCINE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4bbaTWOj59xYMfrXjqS8X1?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UaapDSDcQXo?si=kUmXRxoqZLPbKQbZ" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The explosive Parisian hardcore punk scene is in full swing with incredible bands such as Worst Doubt, Sorcerer, Headbussa, Cold Decay and Take It In Blood for example. And you can also count on CALCINE and their metallic brew spiced up with hip-hop bits. A great explosion of sound with lyrics pointing out what’s wrong in our society. Be ready to fight alongside them in the early morning.

attributes.title: GORILLA BISCUITS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4dJX4iJ0qbB4gjkeenbK2N?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YnIEgnar4aY?si=Zqr6LpB0urY4rWXY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les vieux pots, la bonne soupe, "c'était mieux avant"… Quitte à passer pour des vieux cons autant bien le faire ! Nous sommes donc tout heureux et pas peu fiers d’enfin faire venir un des vieux de la vieille, fleuron du hardcore sXe, ayant sorti ce qui reste à ce jour l’une des meilleures galettes du genre de tous les temps avec Start Today. Vétérans certes, mais indémodables et toujours aussi énergiques. Tout simplement mythiques !

attributes.title: GORILLA BISCUITS
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4dJX4iJ0qbB4gjkeenbK2N?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YnIEgnar4aY?si=Zqr6LpB0urY4rWXY" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: “It used to be better”! Stop being an old poser and start respecting the kings! We are so glad, and more than a little proud, to finally be bringing the elders of the elders, the straightedge hardcore pioneers, the band who put out some of the best records the genre has ever seen: GORILLA BISCUITS. Veterans to be sure, but always energetic, fun and a little bit terrifying. They are living legends for a reason!

attributes.title: GOUGE AWAY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1Gi5tHYi0ptGG0G3tX9PkU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EBNULIVst3s?si=hjA4giosNcC0aOAK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Difficile pour notre quintet floridien de nier son amour pour les Pixies quand on tient son nom d’un titre issu du chef-d’œuvre Doolittle. Avec ses sonorités indie, noisy, grungy et post-hardcore, le combo emmené par Christina Michelle est toujours sur le fil du rasoir, alternant passages hargneux et moments de calme, avec des brûlots furieux toujours à la limite de la colère. Un torrent d’émotions sonnant la révolte de la nouvelle génération hardcore.

attributes.title: GOUGE AWAY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1Gi5tHYi0ptGG0G3tX9PkU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EBNULIVst3s?si=hjA4giosNcC0aOAK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The Floridian quintet love the Pixies so much that they took their name from a song from the masterpiece Doolittle. With its indie, noisy, grungy and post-hardcore sounds, the combo led by Christina Michelle is always on the razor's edge, alternating anger and tranquillity. This is a massive torrent of emotions ringing in the revolt of the new hardcore generation.

attributes.title: GUILT TRIP
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/07mhRucOGu6NJvRNVzqoxU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O0dlwcJL-aE?si=3Lurc0UIzajvNuuv" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le flegme et la classe britanniques, nos 5 Mancuniens n’en ont cure. Chez eux, c’est plutôt esprit franchouillard et camaraderie, certes dans sa version « poing dans la gueule » plutôt que « bras-dessus, bras-dessous ». Mais après tout, on ne fait pas de hardcore sans casser des nez ! De bons gros riffs thrashy, des breakdowns de bâtard et un groove bien déglingo : bourre-pifs et mandales dans ta face, la recette de l’amitié selon GUILT TRIP.

attributes.title: GUILT TRIP
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/07mhRucOGu6NJvRNVzqoxU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O0dlwcJL-aE?si=3Lurc0UIzajvNuuv" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: These Mancunians don't give a shit about phlegm and decorum. Their definition of hardcore punk music lies in the number of broken noses and bruises. With which soundtrack? Big thrash metal-like riffs, strong breakdowns and a very sick groove. A fist in your face: it’s a testimony of friendship according to GUILT TRIP.

attributes.title: KNOCKED LOOSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4qrHkx5cgWIslciLXUMrYw?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RAuuVY__KQ0?si=JXfsmJi6KgfMbV2R" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les p’tits gars du Kentucky se sont rapidement débarrassés des étiquettes d’espoirs ou de challengers pour devenir purement et simplement un des mastodontes du hardcore mondial. L’exploit n’est pas mince tant le groupe ne cherche pas à flirter avec les compromis, déployant à la tâche une fureur rare et implacable avec un beatdown/metalcore punitif. Quelle meilleure tête d’affiche que celle-ci pour clôturer la programmation de la Warzone cette année ?

attributes.title: KNOCKED LOOSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4qrHkx5cgWIslciLXUMrYw?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RAuuVY__KQ0?si=JXfsmJi6KgfMbV2R" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The guys from Kentucky quickly shed the label of challengers to become one of the juggernauts of world hardcore. The feat is no small feat as the group does not seek compromise, with a rare and implacable fury and a punishing beatdown/metalcore. What better headliner than this to close out this year’s Warzone lineup?

attributes.title: PAIN OF TRUTH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6tnuL2AIiA5wCpO5Pm8Xql?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9CfrDjdRuZY?si=s2RPGtSF_oA9YJx_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Dans un monde où les incertitudes pullulent, il est réconfortant d’être confronté à des problématiques qui ne demandent pas le travail commun de plus de 2 neurones. Avec son hardcore urbain et métallisé, le musculeux gang ricain va droit au but avec des riffs parfumés au parpaing et des vocaux écorchés, gorgés de glaviots XXL. Un résultat riche en protéines qui rime tout autant avec "efficacité" que "prends-ça dans ta gueule"

attributes.title: PAIN OF TRUTH
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6tnuL2AIiA5wCpO5Pm8Xql?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9CfrDjdRuZY?si=s2RPGtSF_oA9YJx_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: In a world of uncertainty, it's comforting to indulge in music that only really takes 2 brain cells. With their metallic urban brand of hardcore, this muscular long Island crew comes straight for your face with tasteful riffs, scorching vocals and XXL mosh pits. Prepare for a protein rich performance that is efficient and in your face. It will be completely unrelenting.

attributes.title: WALLS OF JERICHO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/60cGRl68qyCBMqZi3tiHEU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8jDq49PdiNY?si=7qTR3cTIjm9pDOin" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Qui en 2025 croit encore qu’il faut être un bonhomme pour jouer les gros durs sur scène ? Certainement pas Candace Kucsulain, la tonitruante frontwoman du combo de Détroit. Voilà presque 25 ans qu’elle n’a pas son pareil pour haranguer les foules et se mettre un public dans la poche au premier beuglement. Ayant ouvert la voie à la féminisation de la sphère hardcore, elle vient une nouvelle fois faire étalage de sa puissance !

attributes.title: WALLS OF JERICHO
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/60cGRl68qyCBMqZi3tiHEU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8jDq49PdiNY?si=7qTR3cTIjm9pDOin" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Why would these hardcore/metalcore legends fall silent after more than 20 years? Today, they seem more relentless than ever: there`s no space for soft nuances! WALLS OF JERICHO fans worldwide count on the unmatched aggression and integrity of Detroit’s daughter and sons - be it at their brutal live shows or on record! Maddening riffing, downbeats, and huge breakdowns proudly display the band’s historical vigour. Elegiac hardcore parts mix well with metallic splendour!

attributes.title: GOOD RIDDANCE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1Yunxnwa5znrQ9Ha7dZeHO?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dTwZmC6_jEk?si=SZeFPOYLFB7JmEJh" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Depuis plus de 30 ans, GOOD RIDDANCE est une voix essentielle de la scène punk avec pléthore d’hymnes condamnant avec verve l'injustice politique et sociale et mettant à l’honneur des causes nobles. Refusant le statu quo, le groupe ne cesse de se remettre en cause, multipliant les combats et les prises de risque avec des disques inspirés et sur le fil du rasoir. Une influence toujours vivace auprès de générations de punks et d’activistes.

attributes.title: GOOD RIDDANCE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1Yunxnwa5znrQ9Ha7dZeHO?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: For over 30 years, GOOD RIDDANCE has been a vital voice in the punk scene, crafting anthems that confront political and social injustice head-on. Over the years, they’ve released a string of influential records, cementing their place as a band unafraid to challenge the status quo. Their enduring influence is felt across generations of punk listeners who were introduced to activism, vegetarianism, and social justice through their music.

attributes.title: BLOOD COMMAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4WfUbvICLrqPW9rzuNGS1f?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hcDyDii-Low?si=oRmnUpqIAiEYAF1C" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le punk rock n’est pas réservé aux nihilistes rosbifs, ni aux Californiens bronzés. La preuve par l’exemple avec cet incroyable combo venu tout droit du pays du black metal qui dynamite le genre avec des digressions popisantes irrésistibles, quand il ne l’assaisonne pas avec des blastbeats, des passages planants ou des envolées hardcore de derrière les fagots. Un groupe marginal qui va marquer les esprits et cette édition sans coup férir.

attributes.title: BLOOD COMMAND
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4WfUbvICLrqPW9rzuNGS1f?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hcDyDii-Low?si=oRmnUpqIAiEYAF1C" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Punk rock is not strictly the prerogative of British nihilists or tanned Californians. Proof by example with this incredible combo coming straight from the land of black metal who dynamites the genre with irresistible pop melodies, blastbeats, soaring passages or hardcore influences. BLOOD COMMAND will leave their mark on this year’s edition.

attributes.title: FALLING IN REVERSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2CmaKO2zEGJ1NWpS1yfVGz?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hX0lhueeib8?si=3yOEOXWOQMxocbTR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: L’avenir appartient à ceux qui se lèvent tôt. Au vu de l’ascension fulgurante de la carrière de la bande emmenée par Ronnie Radke, il y a fort à parier que le réveil a dû sonner aux aurores pour elle. Avec sa volonté de repousser sans cesse les frontières et une exploration toujours plus innovante de nouveaux territoires musicaux, le groupe de Las Vegas ne cesse de surprendre et fait carrément sauter la banque.

attributes.title: FALLING IN REVERSE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2CmaKO2zEGJ1NWpS1yfVGz?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hX0lhueeib8?si=3yOEOXWOQMxocbTR" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: With its desire to constantly push boundaries and an ever more innovative exploration of musical territories, the Las Vegas group never ceases to surprise and absolutely rocks the house. The band’s latest offering Popular Monster (2024) marks another chapter in the ongoing story of an entity that beats the odds, surmounting obstacles both within and without. A reimagined nu-metal mix: furious metal, melody, and hip-hop.

attributes.title: LORNA SHORE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6vXYoy8ouRVib302zxaxFF?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qyYmS_iBcy4?si=9nGz0XJ9Aoo7iLw_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Que de chemin parcouru par la bande désormais menée par le phénomène vocal Will Ramos. Nouvelle figure emblématique de la scène deathcore, LORNA SHORE n’en finit plus de pousser à l’extrême tout ce qu’elle touche, des orchestrations symphoniques aux solos épiques en passant par la brutalité outrancière de ses breakdowns ou la férocité des growls. Une relation idyllique entre sauvagerie et mélodie qui va tabasser plus d’un festivalier.

attributes.title: LORNA SHORE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6vXYoy8ouRVib302zxaxFF?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qyYmS_iBcy4?si=9nGz0XJ9Aoo7iLw_" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: So much ground has been by covered in about 15 years! Now vocally led by Will Ramos, LORNA SHORE is a band breaking out of any sort of categorisation and stepping into their own as a great extreme metal band. LORNA SHORE has woven together a sprawling testimony of ambition, soul and ability that few can match. The New Jersey gang thinks big, pushing beyond preconception or musical boundaries.

attributes.title: MOTIONLESS IN WHITE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6MwPCCR936cYfM1dLsGVnl?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Pj2miRJ6bZs?si=vyWnL2ORUBWebAju" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Les petits gars au look étudié poursuivent leur ascension vers le sommet du metalcore avec une nouvelle participation au festival. Le groupe est passé du statut prometteur de ses débuts à celui de véritable institution grâce à un travail acharné et une inspiration très personnelle et dénuée d’opportunisme. Variant les ambiances comme jamais, leur metalcore gothique a gagné en agressivité comme en mélodie pour un résultat encore plus impactant.

attributes.title: MOTIONLESS IN WHITE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6MwPCCR936cYfM1dLsGVnl?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Pj2miRJ6bZs?si=vyWnL2ORUBWebAju" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: These guys continue their rise to the top of the metalcore scene. They have become an institution thanks to hard work ethics and a very personal inspiration devoid of opportunism. Varying atmospheres like never before, their gothic-inspired metalcore has gained in aggression as well as in melody for an even more impactful result.

attributes.title: POPPY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5mlbvTfWUOfDrUIK6dkNzv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OqVNYcaS-3E?si=Rt-abnPCjfCZEjwk" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Depuis qu’elle s’est libérée de son mentor quelque peu toxique, Moriah Rose Pereira, alias POPPY, n’en finit plus de grandir. Une ascension qui ne doit rien au hasard, puisque son mélange de pop mâtiné de metal (à moins que ce ne soit l’inverse), dont les variations stylistiques feraient pâlir tout contorsionniste digne de ce nom, ne manquera pas de vous titiller également. Une œuvre barrée et sucrée, sacrément rafraîchissante.

attributes.title: POPPY
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5mlbvTfWUOfDrUIK6dkNzv?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OqVNYcaS-3E?si=Rt-abnPCjfCZEjwk" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: The success of Moriah Rose Pereira, aka POPPY, continues to grow and cannot be stopped and is fully deserved. Her mix of pop music mixed with metal madness (unless it's the other way around) is truly astonishing. A refreshing work that breaks the codes. An essential artist to discover urgently.

attributes.title: THE CHAINSAW MOTEL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4HsuHCwO2CpuP9V2YoNxvf?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

attributes.content: A l’image du célèbre film sanglant de Tobe Hopper et Kim Henkel, le duo de l'Ouest se mue en Leatherface et vous attaque avec son mélange nu metal, punk-hardcore et stoner qui – bien que joué à deux – fait autant de bruit que s’ils étaient cinq. Un son qui terrasse et qui s’abat sur vous de manière frontale. Si vous avez eu la chance d’échapper à Bubba Sawyer, on ne donne en revanche pas cher de votre peau face à THE CHAINSAW MOTEL !

attributes.title: THE CHAINSAW MOTEL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4HsuHCwO2CpuP9V2YoNxvf?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cfgtZjNVMnc?si=ucK1Evz_yr75eenl" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: THE CHAINSAW MOTEL combines cult horror movies with good rock. Musically influenced by various artists, the duet sits at the crossroads of genres, between rock, hardcore, stoner, hip hop... These guys set no limits, and a powerful, uncompromising sound with ultra-powerful melodies and a well-felt aggressiveness.

attributes.title: ASHEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0ussJndMOAWWfaUtXSttFU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OqV77SRFvg4?si=5edcG5c9agAIjrEK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Considérant le groupe comme un véritable outil cathartique, ses membres tirent l’essence de leur créativité dans les traumatismes, la peur et l'anxiété. Ils se réinventent sans cesse, tant musicalement que visuellement, en faisant appel à des identités différentes et à des personnages variés. Leur musique, pleine de textures irrégulières et d’atmosphères déchirantes, illustre les souffrances du passé et les peurs de l’avenir.

attributes.title: ASHEN
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0ussJndMOAWWfaUtXSttFU?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OqV77SRFvg4?si=5edcG5c9agAIjrEK" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: ASHEN is a cathartic tool for its members, pushing them to develop a plural and introspective identity. Traumas, fear and anxiety are the essence of their creativity. Their music, made up of ragged textures and evoking harrowing atmospheres, illustrates sufferings from the past and fears for the future. ASHEN deals in depth with the expression of the intense and conflicting feelings that come with living in the modern world.

attributes.title: BASTARDANE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5Bt0klpQtEMLXb0n2bCq85?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WVA77G8t3mA?si=sG5WE9qcVZq26b6L" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: BASTARDANE fusionne goulûment riffs véloces et groove puissant pour créer un amalgame unique de sludge, de thrash et de rock mélodique. Le monde a besoin de ces jeunots sauvages, débraillés, sales et qui ne se soucient de rien. Le monde a besoin de ces mecs et de leur musique plombée. De leurs riffs crépitants célébrant la copulation de Black Sabbath et Corrosion Of Conformity au mépris des conventions. Le monde a besoin de BASTARDANE.

attributes.title: BASTARDANE
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5Bt0klpQtEMLXb0n2bCq85?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WVA77G8t3mA?si=sG5WE9qcVZq26b6L" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: A hard rock trio formed in Savannah and relocated to Los Angeles, BASTARDANE fuses fast, high gain riffs and power chord grooves with heavy feedback and clean, dissonant chord progressions to create a unique amalgamation of sludge, thrash, and melodic rock. The world needs wild, scruffy, unwashed youths who don’t care about bullshit. The world needs these youths to make music that is weighted in lead whilst carrying a cracking riff, propelled by feral sledgehammer drums, an overall Sabbath-meets-COC air, and a total disregard for convention within that framework. The world (that includes you) needs BASTARDANE.

attributes.title: BLACKGOLD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3IWxZuMgQKWrNn1S20D1qa?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/w353nsypIcE?si=aBfCsLJ-ueaTeOl4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Le nu-metal n’est pas mort : il est plus que jamais en vie ! Et la nouvelle sensation que voilà en est la preuve plus que vivace. Bienvenue dans l’univers stylé du crew noir et or qui nous ramène à la fin des années 90 avec les recettes du genre, une conviction rare et une fraîcheur bienvenue. Des riffs bodybuildés, des scratchs omniprésents, un groove imparable, un flow dansant et enragé : les ingrédients incontournables pour s’éclater dans les grandes largeurs !

attributes.title: BLACKGOLD
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/3IWxZuMgQKWrNn1S20D1qa?utm_source=generator&theme=0" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
attributes.video_embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/w353nsypIcE?si=aBfCsLJ-ueaTeOl4" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
attributes.content: Nu-metal is not dead. And this is the vivid proof of it. Welcome to the stylish world of BLACKGOLD who takes us back to the end of the 90s with rare conviction, a welcome freshness and their very-own rage-inducing sound. Massive riffs, tasty scratches, an unstoppable groove, a furious flow: welcome to the party!

attributes.title: CYPRESS HILL
attributes.audio_embed: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4P0dddbxPil35MNN9G2MEX?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
